comments: Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

Should be called adzy. During the level theres an ad banner at the bottom. At the end of every level there's an ad, some you can't skip and have to wait an entire 30 secs to sit through. To make matters worse, the chests can be boosted by 50% by watching, you guessed it, an ad.  They don't even give you a shop option to remove ads for a small amount of money or some sort of package. Pure plain greed

All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

Good little time waster, simple classic gameplay but puts its own unique twist on it.   Side note: I clearly played this game more than they thought anyone would as I have started getting repeated designs when I upgrade my spells xD

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

This game is simple. So simple that it is stupidly addictive at times when my mental and physical ability equates to a bowl of fruit. Nothing in this game brings me more satisfaction than the immensity of lag when bolts are caught in rapid bounce in a confined space. I say that with the utmost sincerity, no sarcasm at all. The lag is so intense, so joyful to watch. Please don't take it away from me. It is beautiful.
description: Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.

The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.

Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.

description: The official World of Peppa Pig app offers your family a safe and ad-free environment filled with lots of learning and fun! Featuring the award-winning show’s friendly characters, there are plenty of interactive games and activities for your little ones to enjoy and grow with.Start your FREE 7-DAY TRIAL for a World of Peppa Pig subscription now to gain UNLIMITED ACCESS to all the activities, and join the fun with everyone’s favorite little piggy - snorts and giggles guaranteed! There is always something new to discover and explore every 2 weeks. No need to worry – you can cancel at any time! Play, Learn, Create, Watch and Sing with our exclusive content:-	Encourage curiosity while planting mysterious seeds in Grandpa Pig’s garden -	Learn with Peppa by reading along to the Alphabet, or testing your memory skills-	Get creative with our unique coloring pages, or Paint with Peppa and create your own artwork-	Exercise your SILLY imagination by dressing up all the members of the Pig family -	Watch exclusive ad-free Peppa Pig clips, only found in the app-	Celebrate YOUR Birthday, and different calendar events -	And SO much more!With activities tailored for Preschoolers, Parents can find peace of mind in knowing our activities are age-appropriate, and full of fun and learning. comments: I used to play this game a couple years ago, and at the time, it had satisfying gameplay and great time killing qualities. I used to love it then and I still do now, but I've recently noticed pretty annoying glitch that's driving me away from the game. For some reason, a few hours after I download the game, it doesn't allow me to enter the game anymore. When I open the game,  it will run smoothly up until the point when it reaches the loading screen and simply returns me to the home screen. I try to reopen it and the same thing happens. I'm not really sure why this happens, but until this glitch is gone, I will be forced to stay away from the game entirely as the only way to fix this glitch is to download the game again which is quite time consuming.

Marvelous game!!! Likely you back to the right on your last update.  I just purchased the chainsaw blade, the DRAGON blade was a huge desappointment we was expecting phenomenal motions not that catoon flag . Also : all the good stuff are in mini game, the others dojos are kind very less quality, let us use minigame blades and dojos in arcade or zen even by purchase that will be nice. Thank you
I downloaded the game, and loved it. But now whenever I try to open it, it goes up to the loading screen, and then takes me back to my home screen.
Great game but after I completed the tutorial it kicked me out of the app. I keep trying to get back in but it kicks me out still.
I'm missing some blades & can't complete some missions because of it? Please help. Love the game otherwise other than a few glitches.
This fruit ninja is great! However, I sorely miss Fruit Ninja: Puss In Boots, and I'd really like it back!
description: Welcome to the dojo, ninja. Your objective: become a master of slicing fruit! What better way to do that than play Fruit Ninja, the original hit fruit-slicing mobile game? 🍉Unsheathe your blade and start the juicy carnage with the three classic game modes that billions of players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the fan-favourite Arcade mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive combos with the help of the special Double Score, Freeze or Frenzy bananas. Need something less intense? Simply relax and slash for stress relief in Zen Mode. Finally, cut as much as you can in the endless Classic mode – just avoid the bombs and make sure you don’t drop the fruit! Make your game even more exciting by equipping special powerups that will give your score a juicy boost. 🍓Once you’ve sharpened your skills and reflexes, put them to the test in Event mode, where you’ll enter challenging and intense clashes with characters like Truffles the pig, Mari and Rinjin for the chance to win unique swords and dojos that can be used in Classic, Zen and Arcade mode. Spice up your day and make yourself more energetic in our daily Challenge mode - can you out-slice the other ninjas for special prizes and glory? 🏆Prove to your friends and family that you’re the top ninja around. Show them how much you can cut in a shared-screen local multiplayer match, or compare your score with your friends to rise through the ranks and reach the top of the leaderboard! Big fan of Fruit Ninja: Puss in Boots? Be sure to challenge yourself with the entertaining and addictive minigames and find your favourite! 🍒What are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun and trying to relax and pass the time, or trying to improve your skills as a master ninja, this is the game for you. Enjoy the awesomeness and believe the hype of Fruit Ninja – chop chop! ⚔️View our privacy policy at http://halfbrick.com/pp View our terms of service at http://halfbrick.com/tosNeed help with the game? Email us at fruitninja@halfbrick.com

Unsheathe your blade and start the juicy carnage with the three classic game modes that billions of players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the fan-favourite Arcade mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive combos with the help of the special Double Score, Freeze or Frenzy bananas. Once you’ve sharpened your skills and reflexes, put them to the test in Event mode, where you’ll enter challenging and intense clashes with characters like Truffles the pig, Mari and Rinjin for the chance to win unique swords and dojos that can be used in Classic, Zen and Arcade mode. Prove to your friends and family that you’re the top ninja around. comments: Very simple but addictive game. Love the fact there is not a life limit so you can play for as long or short a time as you have available. I would definitely recommend this game. Its very good game but after playing more it will become boring it should be little more intresting

Its a really fun and great game to play.
description: Race through Heartlake City in LEGO® Friends: Heartlake Rush! This fast, fun, and furious endless runner puts you in the driver’s seat as you jump, duck, and swerve through the busy streets in your LEGO racer! Can you complete all 60 levels?Drive as Andrea, Mia, Olivia, Emma, Stephanie, or their friends as you zip through the city and collect coins and other special items. Unlock decorations, new vehicles, and new playable characters! Find and collect Zobo, and he’ll transform your racer into a jet plane soaring above Heartlake City!- DRIVE through Heartlake City as your favorite Friends character!- COLLECT coins, ice cream, fruit, flowers, gifts, confetti bombs, and a special collectible item for each of the five Friends!- COMPLETE MISSIONS to level up and earn more coins!- DODGE enemies coming right at you!- DECORATE your cars with unlockable decals!- BOOST AND TRANSFORM your car into a jet by picking up Zobo the robot!- UNLOCK all 10 playable characters and cars by earning coin rewards!- MIX AND MATCH your characters, cars, and decals for a true LEGO building experience!- SAFETY FIRST: Play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. description: Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!STYLINGStyling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.DRIVER'S SKILLSUpgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.TUNINGYou are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.DRIVING PHYSICSIt's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!
descriptionHTML:
Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!

STYLING
Styling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.

DRIVER'S SKILLS
Upgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.

TUNING
You are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.

DRIVING PHYSICS
It's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!

Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!

comments: Very fun and time killing. I play with my bf and 2 friends and we all try to beat eachothers high scores. It can be pretty competitive. Im prob gonna try to get more ppl to play with me too lol. There could be more variety in the blocks, and there should be like different modes, just an idea

Its cool and all but needs some extra features.  Maybe a way to store 1 brick for later or some level advancement.  Maybe challenges or a power up system. The game is addictive but its very basic. with no real progression path,  other than beating your own high score, it becomes boring.  Still,  thanks for what it is.

What they show on the preview and what it gives you in game don't even match. They make it look like it so easy. You cannot rotate the pieces. The pieces they give are so random, and most games you can barely get past a couple of turns before you can't place anymore and you lose.

This is very deceiving. It looks like it's Tetris, but it's not. The pieces don't come down like the pictures show. I hate apps like this who deceive people to believe its a certain game when it's not just to get people to download. Will never download a game from this developer again.
Would like to sometimes when my score is really high get a second chance to redeem myself. Other wise I like the game - kills some time when needed👍

Love the game can't seem to put it down. Great time passes while you're waiting for your washing to dry at the laundromat, beats watching it spin around. Not happy with all the adds popping up after every game and sometimes in the middle of a game.
description: The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.
descriptionHTML: The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.
summary: A simple but addictive Puzzle game.

comments: Where is korobeiniki??

Excellent fun and a fantastic way to introduce a new audience to some wonderful classical music as well as very talented contempory composers. My one gripe is that recently players have been given multiple oportunities to get 3 crowns or very high scores with ad powered resources. I feel this takes a lot of the challenge from the game. Anyone can get 3 crowns in 4 or 5 goes where us old guard of the game did if in 1 or 2 Still an awesome game though and well worth the download anytime.

This game can fit almost ANY personality type, keeping you entertained for hours!  Don't worry about getting low scores, because the game starts out slow and gets faster, so you'll always be prepared for faster tiles.  There are challenges where you challenge other people in the world!  I never want to give up on this game, its really addicting!

I enjoy this game a lot and always loved how it challenged me. It was also fun when me and my friends would fight to see who's better but I dislike the update where they added boosters, it doesn't seem fair and for me it feel like it loses the title for being relaxing. I don't think that adding those futures was a great idea in my opinion and I really miss the old version a lot.

This game has no WORLD'S favourite song  DESPACITO  SO i m hating it tooooo much  when i see this then i think that let's download it bcoz it contains despacito song also but when i see all album of this app then i started hated it. So i would request from CHEETAH GAMES that plezz add DESPACITO SONG also in it This is my humble request from CHEETAH GAMES.

Great game. Played to level 120 and have over 500 gems but then I switched devices. This requires a Facebook account which I did not have. It worked for a little bit until Facebook disabled my account for doing nothing. They need to fix the method they use to sync progress. Now I am level 3 with 17 gems.

description: Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for KidsCrafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. comments: I've been on Township since 2015 and I absolutely love it. Its the first game I play in the morning and the last one I play at night. This game has so much personality. From the characters to the animals, it is by far the best game that I've played so far. Keeps me busy for hours and I recently got my boyfriend hooked, keeps him as busy as it does myself. I don't have any complaints about it. Thank you GPG for coming up with a game so super fantastic. Kudos to the developers.

This game needs the ability to gain more township cash. I have spent way too much real money to buy township cash and im not doing so again at this rate. Farmville isnt this bad and hard to expand.  You cant expand the barn without waiting on products by train or paying in township cash to expand. And that costs over a couple hundred township cash for each expansion. Getting a dollar or two here and there takes forever to collect. Plus the expansion makes small expansions so it doesnt help much.   If something dont change i may quit the game. I enjoy it and would like to continue but at this rate i dont see much point. I cant afford to pay more money to play.

The VERY best game EVER..so fast to level up... Never boring.. Always SO much to do!!! ... it NEVER asks 4 money !!!!!!   NO pop ups or commercials. !!!. . the inventors are genius... i Love this game..  thank you for making this game.. Graphics are Amazing!!!   Best farming game ...Bonus Zoo !!!...and breed ur animals ADORABLE BABIES.. with a splash of Cityville  ..Gold digging..making ingots to use...  So many optional tournaments if u want to win more money n prizes in the Regattas... Township friends make it SO much easier n fast 4 everyone  .. and so much more You just HAVE TO Try TOWNSHIP ❣💞

The Best!  But not Great my suggestion is please add an option to chat your friends privately this is important!.  Also add an option to search anyone by their township name so we can easily adding them.. Last one add an option to change your profiles photo from our gallery if you can~ instead of using our Facebook photos or township original photos.. Please make it happen

Great game very addictive, and I don't know if I just found the right Co-op or what but the team work on this game is amazing. I love my little town although, 😒 you need to be able to expand faster! I have NO ROOM for any more buildings, and they want me to expand my population so I can add more buildings. Thats's kind of ridiculous. That's the only bad thing I have to say about this game.

Fantastically animated time-killer, very detailed and interesting to watch when you actually do pay attention to the stuff that happens around a well designed town. The co-op portion of the gameplay is just enough social interaction that I like in games like this. It isn't forced. Nothing really is, and that is rare for games like this. Keep them coming, I'm enjoying them!
description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!Township features:● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect● Lovely animals to take care of● Farms to manage and expand● Exotic goods brought from islands● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.

Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.

comments: Excellent brain exercise. It would be better that, instead of giving a 'resigned' message, which implies it was wilful, a 'time expired' reason was given, as sometimes a player unintentionally leaves it too long to make a move. Or differentiate between the two. I.e. if a player resigns it is 'resigned. If a game times out it is 'timed out'.

This game is extremely addictive if you play the right way. It can help millions of your brain  cells  stay alive. If you want to be a great player, you must master with 2-letters word and 3-letters word. If you are not good  at it, then you'll be struggling against your opponent.
You must install the timer. I don't want to wait for days for my opponents to make their words
Love playing. Very easy to use. I have had no problems with the app
Dictionary needs updating, missing known words like places and companies
I love playing! I've never had problems with the app
description: Play against 30 million opponents!Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!Features:- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents- Play in 30 simultaneous games!- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries- Chat with your opponentsFor more information on Wordfeud, visit us at Wordfeud.com and follow on Twitter @wordfeud. Also check out the Facebook fan page at http://www.facebook.com/WordfeudGame
descriptionHTML:
Play against 30 million opponents!

Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!

Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.

Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!

Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!

Features:
- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents
- Play in 30 simultaneous games!
- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles
- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move
- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries
- Chat with your opponents

For more information on Wordfeud, visit us at Wordfeud.com and follow on Twitter @wordfeud. Also check out the Facebook fan page at http://www.facebook.com/WordfeudGame

comments: DON'T INSTALL THIS GAME...it's just another money machine. I'd played this game for 4 month and the amount of money you have to spent to be able to level up your teams is endless. You will pay for an lootbox system and be sure...it's just a money machine with ridiculous prices...this is far away from free to play... The leveling management and so called game meta is simply stupid..."Do you wanna lose a raid-match when your team is on 3000 and the other on 2200 points." ...ridiculous. Updates are just "price enhancements" and new modes which are only playable if you spent more money.

I've played this game for quite some time now.  I've spent a good deal of money and have enjoyed it up until now.  The basic gameplay is fun but if you want to be competitive it is a must to spend money.  The most frustrating part though is spending money and getting nothing in return.  I've been waiting for mats for a couple five stars for months.  The problem is you're not rewarded for what you put in it is all about luck of the draw.  An unlucky person like myself could spend a lot and wait forever to see any benefit

I a, enjoying the game I do agree with some that if you want to really enjoy it you have to spend but idk why people moan about that as at the end of the day that's life you end up having to pay for anything and everything you don't have too no one is forcing you too!! You choose too so stop whining however with that being said I do thing the cost of gems packs are exspensive consider lowering the price maybe more will be willing to pay to play..

Out of everything a few hours in. Complex and stingy. Slow, tedious  progression. Very random luck on  gameboard with too few gems shown to have any matching strategy.  Relies on random matching of gems falling. Uninstalling.
I just did 4x 10pulls and didnt get a single 5*. Seriously, that's just poor management. Last time I spend any money. Don't spend your cash, it wont be beneficial. I wish I coukd get a refund.

Despite the balancing improvements the game particularly in Raids still needs lots of improvements since someone with 400 less power than you with characters in lower tiers can still completely kick your ass. Serious detriment to wanting to continue to play if no matter how you level them up you still lose.

comments: This is for the makers of this game you need to introduce rules so that players who either work for the makers or spend 100's to become strong very quickly... cannot destroy the enjoyment of the game for those of us who would like to grow in the game and play the game properly to become strong through perseverance and hard work... the cash rich players are ruining this game for everyone...

I love this game, good strategy and quite time consuming. Wish they would fix the glitches of it lagging out on world map and regular "initialization failure" when trying to switch accounts. Now, with this new update, i cant even play anymore; it just freezes up during the loading page...

Has alot to keep you busy. For that i give 5 stars. Minus 1 star because certain features in the game cannot be unlocked unless you spend money. To me thats a recipe for a slow death. For i will soon be leaving guns of glory in a blaze of glory based on that alone.

A giant mess of people who pay a ton of money to prey on anyone with impunity. Absolutely no rules regarding who or how often you can attack someone significantly lower in level. Even if you are stupid enough to pour money into this garbage, you will get your butt handed to you by someone else.

I love the game, it's great and always looking forward to playing it, and lately it's been freezing and exiting me out of the game every couple of minutes. So it's kind of hard to enjoy this great game. Also I don't know if there's a way to develope another estate but I think that would be beneficial to the game and pretty cool.

You guys really need to do some balancing. It's ridiculous that a level 22 guy can just annihilate me when I'm level 10. Its pretty blatant that you're trying to force us to pay to play. You should make it to where you can only attack X levels below you and the further down you go, the less loot/xp you get, if you attack even or higher you get bonus loot/xp. Good game but needs rebalancing asap or your game will slowly die.
description: Get ready for the next stage of warfare with the free strategy MMO Guns of Glory! GoG’s thrilling multiplayer RTS gameplay lets you raise your own powerful army to shoot down enemies and team up with friends from around the globe.In Guns of Glory, you take the lead as a rising Lord in a Kingdom thrown into war! To become supreme ruler and seize the Crown of Destiny from the devious Cardinal, you’ll ally with the famous Three Musketeers, slay ferocious beasts, build your own magnificent Castle, engineer an unstoppable Airship, rally with friends to destroy enemies, and more!FEATURES:Strategy Warfare! Train an army of loyal Musketeers, manage your resources, construct devious traps and raid your enemies into oblivion, all in order to claim the crown and turn your Alliance into an unbeatable empire!Powerful Airships! In an era of emerging progress and science, shoot down enemies and lead the attack with deadly advanced aircraft for a new level of RTS warfare. How will you customize your own flying warship?World War! Seamless chat translation features make GoG’s multiplayer RTS and RPG gameplay richer than ever before – making friends from anywhere in the world has never been so simple.Immersive MMO World! Guns of Glory brings the world of the Three Musketeers to life like you’ve never seen it before! Gorgeously rendered HD graphics and vivid, beautiful landscapes make all the action in this free strategy MMORPG spring to life!Advanced RTS Combat! Set your own strategy to attack enemies and aid allies! Guns of Glory’s strategy MMORPG gameplay lets you customize your Airship, Estate, troops, buildings, equipment and more. Develop a game strategy to fit your own style in GoG and claim victory!Empire Building! Construct a glorious fortified Estate, master a range of devastating skills and arm yourself with indestructible weapons to ensure your survival and success in this world of multiplayer strategy war!SUPPORTAre you having problems?  https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/guns-of-glory/Privacy Policy: http://www.funplus.com/privacy_policy/Facebook fanpage:www.facebook.com/gunsofglorygamePLEASE NOTE: Guns of Glory is completely free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required. Will you be able to claim Glory?

comments: Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..😉😉 I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...😂😂 Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. 😘😘😘❤️❤️❤️

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Another great game from ketchapp. A very unique idea, executed well and with nice graphics. It is simple yet difficult, a good combination. I gave it 4 stars however, as sometimes the game takes a while to respond to my touch, and often doesn't respond at all. My phone is quite slow though, so I'm willing to give the game the benefit of the doubt.

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.

I've noticed that when I get higher in the challenges the ones involving lane switching glitch out and never let me complete it. I have counted and I don't think it is possible for me to have counted incorrectly 20+ times repeatedly. Also now whenever I boot up the game it has the beginner tutorial pop-up telling you what to do which is annoying.

I really like this game. But here is why I gave it 2 stars.  I completed all of the challenges but still don't have have enough score to finish ranking up.  The 5 day to secret ball never works for me. It resets after 2 days even though I play everyday.  There should be a counter for how many times you switch lanes. Some of the challenges were impossible because you had to switch lanes exactly x amount.  Also I don't think you should have challenges that make you avoid getting the coins, because the whole point of the game is to win spheres and lanes...

comments: Very addictive. Kind of misleading though. The pictures give the impression you can have large ships like the Titanic or freight carriers, but it seems to only be sailboats

Latest update initially froze the game, but it seems to be working now. Occasionally locks up during gameplay, but a simple exit does the trick.  One of the better games out there. No ads...yet. Doesn't force you to spend money to advance in the game.

Update today broke the game! It starts to load, then freezes when the progress bar maxes out. This is a great game and lots of fun, but you broke it with this update. Please fix asap and I'll 5 star it. Edit: game fixed. It's fun.

comments: I freaking love this game but I do recommend more energy or at least less time to wait for energy. Please and thank you :)  P.S. We need more diamonds some how like. Maybe you should let us watch ads for 2-5 diamond's each ad. Or do a daily login type thing. I restarted the game like over 10 times honestly. Thanks for a great game though.

Thats why i give it five stars and for u new people it is kind of like a tell tale game but has really good graphics so if u r reading this and if u like rp games just download it!

I never thought I would find a game like this that would work so well and play so easily! The only things I would change would be adding videos to gain more gems, or getting 2 gems after each chapter. Maybe even some extra gems after finishing a story? Getting gems on previously finished stories as well. I would also add the option to replay a chapter from the menu, not only after playing the chapter. Other than that, THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!

I really do love the stories this game offers. I just wish the key and diamond system was better. I feel like I've purposely passed up some great stories just to play through them quickly so I could get back to the current story I'm really hooked on. Not to mention I've put money into the game as well. But being on a budget, I'm limited with what I can do. Sadly I think that is what will eventually make me stop playing such a great game. It's just too expensive in the end.

I have fallen in love with this app and whoever created the stories is creative and amazing, however it would be nice if you could make it so we can earn more keys per time given and definitely make it so the good choices don't cost so many diamonds. Those two factors get really annoying and depressing. All the good choices cost way too many diamonds. Unless  you make it so we can earn more of those per chapter and let us earn free ones by watching adds or something. Otherwise, amazing game. Thanks.

Love this app... but please give us more keys and gems. 2 keys is just not enough when you are addicted. Only problem i have is the cost of some of the clothes and choices. Please make it cheaper and easier to get gems without having to spend real money. How about let us watch adds for keys and gems ? PLEASE!! We need more gems!
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team
developerAddress:
Pixelberry Studios
201 SAN ANTONIO CIR 205
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA, 94040-1271, US

comments: This is an awesome game that gives you daily and weekly quest's and offers treasure chests. Now they have new levels to play and collect like blazing sands, and the spooky summit level for Halloween. Then they added the new global challenges.This game just keeps growing, not like many of the other games that just stays the same..you will be amazed. Now they added Global challenges, with new head gear...like I said this game keeps growing...it runs so smooth and the graphics are awesome. If you haven't tried it. Do it. If you have come back and be amazed at the changes.

Thx for updating Frozen Shadows. Blazing Sands still needs work. Too much water, not enough Sand. Needs a "slide," I recommend sand surfing. The canyons also get boring. The variations between it and the other levels don't compare, especially for the gem cost to play it. Still, fun and relaxing, and stays fun. 4/5.

Most of players finished fourteen level so they no need diamonds.so think about genius players.

This is a good mindless game but the interactions have been inconsistent which leads to frustration. They also insist on scrolling through ALL achievements which pops up in the most inconvenient place and this happens multiple times per access, not just at the start. Possibly the most annoying thing ever. Also I would rather be able to pay to have ads removed besides special perks, the lack of this means this games life is limited to me.

descriptionHTML:
Do you like building games?
Block Craft 3D is a new free city building game.

Download now one of the best simulation games of 2017!
Start building and show the world your constructions. Block Craft is a free game for the whole family: from kids, boys and girls, to adults.

Features:
• Fun building game: Lots of different constructions. Build a house, a castle, a mine or even the death-star and Eiffel Tower!
• Perfect game for the family: boys and girls will love it.
• One of the best simulation games: it's a fun and free simulator game!
• Lots of pixels: enjoy the special pixel graphics.
• Free game: play for free!
• Choose your character: boy or girl?
• New: adopt and play with animals! It's fun!

Highlights:
Amazing buildings in 3D
Ready? Block? Go! Learn the game by building your house, a fortress or a mine... Decorate your building with your furniture with your own skins! Play now one of the best construction games!

Lots of Pets and free exploration
Play with pets! Adopt a dog, a cat or even an elephant! Unlike other block games, there are no monsters in Block Craft 3D: you can focus on constructing the best buildings or exploring the world.

Multiplayer game: visit your friends
Start the exploration! You can visit the city built by your friends (or foes) and help them finish their construction. Multiplayer is so much fun!

Create and sell
In Block Craft, no need for mods, launcher or PE. You can create the custom blocks, craft special furniture or complete blueprint of building! And even better: sell those and receive lots of gems!

Not so creative?
In Block Craft 3D, no need for maps, just visit the village of your friends to get new ideas and follow the blueprints and guides to easily build fantastic constructions.

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

For the non experts, let me tell you that 5his game cheats. I sat with a real chessboard to analyse why wasn't I  able to crack master level.   And what i observed was it didn't allow you to make actual moves when you show high levels of intell8gence. Sometimes it makes moves which are faulty. I think there is some mistakes in coding, perhaps deliberately made.  So not a fair play but a foul play.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
recentChanges: - added the save function
- updated difficulties of levels
- added description of stalemate
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: I've liked this game for years. Some adjustments needed: realistically if gas goes empty and you're still coasting or you're in the air you should be able to coast until the vehicle completely stops or lands before the game stops. You've had the nitros in now which is great. However, you still haven't fixed the previous issue. IF I CAN COAST OR NITRO BOOST MYSELF TO A GAS CAN THAT'S LOGICAL. However, you stop the game before the vehicle stops moving which is in a sense, removing logic, and the law of motion!

I hope my tears will help u guys. :)

I guess it's just a lack of interest. Hopefully this time someone will read it............

description: One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.Features: - Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.) - Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD - Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++) - Share your score with a screenshot with your friends! - Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation - Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets) - Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine! - Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts! - Get new boosters to drive even further - 27+ Levels! - 28+ Vehicles!Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more! Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.Follow Us:* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fingersoft* Twitter: @fingersoft* Web: https://www.fingersoft.net* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hillclimbracing_officialTerms of Use: http://fingersoft.net/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://fingersoft.net/privacyHill Climb Racing is a registered trademark of Fingersoft Ltd. All rights reserved.

comments: Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

It is nice that they let the readers write their own stories.  Many of the stories written by readers are more interesting than what Episode offers... The game takes too long to load when I open it and also when it loads a story.  Then you have to sit through at least two ads just to play the story. They need to let authors be able to delete their stories.  That would probably help on the loading time. Maybe if an author wants to delete their story, they have to explain why.  Then the story could be pending deletion (and have a note for readers) until Episode decides to accept or decline.

Not hating AT ALL,I LOVE this app SO MUCH! Just tryna help ya improve! Luv you episode! (Or make more that are inclusive of gender) MEOW LOVE U

Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

I love love love this game! Its really awesome to see the creativity and beauty in an interactive game. There are some things I would love to request; hairstyles. Yes there are lots and that's really awesome but if you could customize both the bangs of the hairstyle AND the back hairstyle. A more diverse set of actions and hand held items. Also, body types. I am a thin girl but it would be a whole lot more to stories if there were curvy girls and not totally buff guys. Speaking of males, male looks to me are more limited than female. Only in special stories are there more diverse male looks. Facial features such as freckles, or scars, moles, and other facial markings would be much appreciated. Gosh this is a lot but I really hope these can be added for a more realistic game play. I love the game and I hope this is seen and added in updates to come

It's an ok app and this is my third time redownloading it, the character designs have gotten better but there only problem I have, the tickets, like really? 2 tickets? First it was 5, then 3, now only 2. Not everyone has money to waste on games, especially tickets, not only that but their overpriced, like any other add on pack/item. I wouldn't even be surprised if I deleted this and redownloaded back in a year and they only give you one ticket a day.

description: Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.• Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

comments: Was fun at first, then massive losing streak due to other players making every single shot perfect.  But most of the time when I start spending money I do better.  Odd.  I think I found a cheater during a putt.  He lined up correctly, however with the power he should have missed the hole.  I tried to watch the replay, but it is the only replay unavailable.  Then when we do the tie breaker shootout, he hits with pinpoint accuracy on the edge of the rough/fairway to get within 2 ft of the hole.

After playing for a while it just isn't that great.  It shows too much of what other people are doing and then makes you go first.  I've now tried for a few months but honestly it's designed to make you spend cash.  I still play a little but constantly think about uninstalling it.  It gives you a free golden tee shot maybe once a week.  The rewards are meh... Because you know if you won too much you wouldn't need to spend real cash.  For the amount of rewards you get it should play the free golden tee shot 3 times a week.  The best feature is that you can save a shot and upload to YouTube easily.

This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

Best game period. Not just golf or sports game, but any game. Wouldn't change a thing. All ya all who say, oh they need to change this or that, and why do I have to play someone who's better than me? Well it's because you suck, and you have no hand eye coordination. Just shut up and dribb, uh I mean play. #1 game for a reason peeps. Love ya. Dueces. Peace biatches.

First of all I love the game, I play every day. I especially love the tournaments. But now I have to congratulate you guys, you are brilliant. You took a push one button to go between guest and Facebook accounts, and changed it to pushing 20 buttons. And now you have to leave the game and go to the Facebook app to push most of them. Apparently you're not happy about two accounts. I don't know why, I spend twice as much money.  Tech monkeys, gotta love 'em.

I think most of the time i am actually playing against a computer and and not a real person . And the computer is programmed to make me lose so that i am forced  spend money on the game. The whole idea of gaming online is to have a friendly yet fair platfotn for people to enjoy and unwind.  So you based on the above very brief of the begining of the end fir companies such as yourselves... i would recommend the following simple advise free of charge.....  Safeguarding  the companies reputation is everything.  The future of gaming ,NOT INCLUDING casino/gambling type apps, will be based on trust and have a more family type target market, and thus should have different business models.

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:

comments: Its the best  game ever and has great look but when I'm  Ms pacman or pacman  I can see the in side of them and a piece  of there leg is cut and Mrs pacman dose the same tricks as classic sonic and pacman dose the same as tails. And what are the power pellets  for 🤔??oh  no I can see Amy's under wear  and when shadow and Amy fall's  from the bonus  stuff or a boss when they land they run like sonic for two seconds and Amy run bad

What really drew me into this game was the the Pac-Man promotion, I love a good crossover and I can say with total certainty that I wouldn't be playing it if I couldn't play as Pac-Man, he's such a good inclusion. It's a super addictive game, setting it aside to do something else is quite difficult, hours go be seamlessly when playing it. The graphics as well are beautiful, very vibrant and colourful.   I have a few minor gripes with the game though, it crashed on me and when I restarted the game I had briefly lost all my content, that gave me a minor scare. The game is heavily geared towards microtransactions as well, unless you're prepared to pay money, get ready for a very, very long grind trying to get the stuff you want. Having said all that I absolutely love the game, very glad I downloaded it.

The game is really solid, serving as a great precursor to Speed Battle in terms of basic gameplay. The missions and occasional events really give the game some gameplay value and the music is a really nice tune, but it will get old not too long after you start playing. I think it's a shame that the characters have no differences; it's purely aesthetic. Different abilities for the characters would have rocked, and Speed Battle improved this slightly, but not much. It's definitely worth a play or two, but don't stick around too much, you're not missing much.
Game looks good and it's well design, but far too many gimmicks and interruption. Hardly ever can actually run. Plus some silly hanging in the air for no reason. Got bored in 5 m

This game is one of the best out there. Now I know it might seem like a remake of Subway Surfers or any other endless runner game out there, but I must say, Sonic Dash is much more than that. You can do way more in this game than you could in Subway Surfers. I would recommend this game of you haven't tried it. It's occupies time and above all else, this is a great game!

Sonic Dash has a plethora of characters to unlock and play as. Some require real money, but most of them can be unlocked with Red Star Rings, and all of the characters can be won through events. You can even get Classic Sonic and Green Hill Zone! And every once in a while, they'll add some characters from different franchises to run as for a limited time, and if you unlock them, you'll be able to play as them forever.
description: Play as Sonic the Hedgehog as you dash, jump and spin your way across stunning 3D environments. Swipe your way over and under challenging obstacles in this fast and frenzied endless running game.SONIC…The world famous Sonic the Hedgehog stars in his first endless running game – how far can you go?…DASH!Unleash Sonic’s incredible dash move that allows you to run at insane speed and destroy everything in your path!AMAZING ABILITIESUtilise Sonic’s powers to dodge hazards, jump over barriers and speed around loop de loops. Plus defeat enemies using Sonic’s devastating homing attack!STUNNING GRAPHICSSonic’s beautifully detailed world comes to life on mobile and tablet – never has an endless runner looked so good!MULTIPLE CHARACTERSChoose to play as one of Sonic’s friends, including Tails, Shadow and Knuckles.EPIC BOSS BATTLESFace off against two of Sonic's biggest rivals, the always scheming and cunning Dr. Eggman and the devastatingly deadly Zazz from Sonic Lost World! Use all of Sonic's agility and speed to take down these villains before it's too late!POWERUPSUnlock, win or buy ingenious power-ups to help you run further. descriptionHTML:
Play as Sonic the Hedgehog as you dash, jump and spin your way across stunning 3D environments. Swipe your way over and under challenging obstacles in this fast and frenzied endless running game.

SONIC…
The world famous Sonic the Hedgehog stars in his first endless running game – how far can you go?

…DASH!
Unleash Sonic’s incredible dash move that allows you to run at insane speed and destroy everything in your path!

AMAZING ABILITIES
Utilise Sonic’s powers to dodge hazards, jump over barriers and speed around loop de loops. Plus defeat enemies using Sonic’s devastating homing attack!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Sonic’s beautifully detailed world comes to life on mobile and tablet – never has an endless runner looked so good!

MULTIPLE CHARACTERS
Choose to play as one of Sonic’s friends, including Tails, Shadow and Knuckles.

EPIC BOSS BATTLES
Face off against two of Sonic's biggest rivals, the always scheming and cunning Dr. Eggman and the devastatingly deadly Zazz from Sonic Lost World! Use all of Sonic's agility and speed to take down these villains before it's too late!

POWERUPS
Unlock, win or buy ingenious power-ups to help you run further. Including head starts, shields, ring magnets and unique score boosters!

KEEP ON RUNNING
Get more rewards the more you play! Level up your score multiplier by completing unique missions, or win amazing prizes including Red Star Rings & additional characters by completing Daily Challenges and playing the Daily Spin.

SOCIALLY CONNECTED
Challenge your friends on the leader boards or invite your friends through Facebook to prove who the best speed runner is…

comments: Update sucks big time. If you mute the game, you'll hear music. If you unmute the game, you hear the blocks. The only way you can play silently is to turn off your phone's media volume which is annoying. If you cannot mute it ingame, why do you need that bottom then? 😬😬😬
Hate the update. Now can't play without any sound. Either have to listen to horrible music or stupid sound effects. Please fix immediately, I really enjoyed this game until now
Update is ridiculous. If you press mute the annoying block sounds go but you get music!! If I press mute it needs to mute do I don't get murdered by fellow commuters on the train! Uninstalling now.

Latest update ruined the game for me. Deleting after playing a thousand times. Music? No thank you. Odd 3D squares? No. Strange animations and lights? Seriously? It was perfect, simple and straightforward... now it is ruined.

I like the new graphics. This game is a good relaxing way to unwind--satisfying after a day of working with difficult problems. Fitting puzzle pieces together and clearing the board is a surprisingly fulfilling task.
I loved this game until the update. The fact there is no way to mute it niw means I can't play it anymore. I'll have to find a similar app and say goodbye to this one. It was fun while it lasted.

comments: I love this game!! "it helps a lot" with my shopping addiction because I feel like I'm buying real merchandise. I really enjoy the updates and how you guys added more room to be designed!!!! Also the 2d & 3d option to view products is awesome!! and if your  studying for interior design this is the app for you! I love the voting of others designs, you get to view everyone creativity. I really love how you guys never ask for an rating....like some apps by the 1st go you get popups please rate our app you guys never asked for an rating I choose to. Thanks for getting me addicted :))

I really love this game. I love voting and seeing what other have also come up with. I love that it is really world design where you can actually shop for pieces and not cartoon rubbish. However, I have had a number of issues where the game has had to restart and have even lost diamonds and cash after trying to collecting daily rewards when it re starts, watching endless adds and not receiving rewards for them or downloading other useless games I have no interest in and actually playing them to generate rewards and not receiving them either. These are my only issues with the game. Other than these it would be five stars.

Great application. Very enjoyable. Only complaint wish app had more international design furniture to match the themes and settings. Also need to fix the bug so that the design loading screen appears.  This is the only app that I have to reset my tablet to get my results, since the last update I have had this issue. I have made an inquiry adressing this issue and it still has not been fixed. I have changed my rating because of this issue, once it has been addressed and fixed I may change my opinion.

I love this game.  The only home design game there is. Glad that that they have added items to the shelves more realistic.  Sometimes I feel it is over designed.  I wouldn't always add that footstool or bench.  It is also difficult to play without spending money and I cannot afford to do that.  Keys are required to decorate properly (plants, decor) and can take a long time to accumulate.  This is my favourite game though and I will continue to play and patiently wait just do my best with what I have.  I do watch the videos to gain more keys but woe is me...

Entertaining, enjoyable and inspiring! Brings out  your creativity in utilizing your available resources and in maximizing your limited funds. The game makes you travel around the globe.  Hope to seeing homes from less popular countries. Sad to note that there are times that free diamonds don't add up after watching the videos and there are items not found in the warehouse.

The game is fun, but results take 2 and 3 days and if other people are on higher levels they have access to better tableware and vases, pictures etc, so their rooms stand out more and they have a better chance at getting 5 stars. And some items I've purchased don't work it gives a message saying they couldn't find it in the warehouse. But the game never gave me my gems back and of money. NEED TO FIX IT
description: Love home decorating? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. It’s quick, it’s fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse décor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.Love the items in your favorite room? You can shop for them directly through Design Home! Click any piece you love and buy it for your own home. With new pieces added every day, Design Home literally puts the best home décor (alternative: furnishings) directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can own them, too!

description: Tired of always losing at Hangman?Now it's time to get back at that noose-wielding bully!Gibbets: Bow Master, the sequel to the smash hit, gives you a chance to save the hangman's victims before they run out of breath! A truly innovative arcade puzzler where you'll have to aim your bow and arrow carefully to cut the hangman's rope without hurting his victims! Use all manner of bonuses and pick ups, warps and teleports, to help you on your quest. Can you handle the frantic pace and save the innocent before they take their final breath?

comments: Just way too many ads. Eventually you start having to watch an ad after every second other level. Its a free game, so I get it but the levels are so quick sometimes I'm watching more than I am playing. Fun game, though. Easy controls and great graphics and sound.

Good fun and very addictive. I see people moaning about the adds 😧 but what can you expect from a free game? You get an add pop up after about 5 puzzles and to be honest it is only for a few seconds....just close it if you don't want to see them.

This game is outstanding. Love the graphics, simple to understand. Some appear quite easy and then you suddenly get a level that looks like it should be but has you scratching your head for AGES!!! Love it. I can live with the adverts, just wish i could put the phone down.

Wonderful game, excellent graphics, its a free game, I solve 2 puzzles and a video ad plays I cant get over it, ad's are repeatedly played and I can't skip, but uninstalling cos too too much of ad's... after 2nd level game is very easy didn't find much interesting..

This game is sooooo frustrating that the game made me through my phone on the ground. If you are good with controlling your stress then you should try it. But if your not good at controlling your stress then do not get it.

Agree with other comments. Great graphics, fun to play, but the ADS!!!!!!!! eventually destroy the fun. Very repetitive after a while and challenge levels seem quite mixed. Have decided to delete the game mainly because of the ad onslaught. Other games have a much better ad/play psychology approach.

description: The ColorPix is an antistress coloring by numbers for adults and children. The ColorPix is the free coloring book. You shouldn't pay for anything! ColorPix has an antistress and relaxing effect. If you don’t have any skills in painting you can try coloring by numbers. The coloring book by numbers is the easiest way to create a beautiful image on your own hands!Coloring by numbers is quite simple even for small kids. We choose a lot of pretty images in pixel art which can be liked by children e.g. kids can color a unicorn or any animals.There are a lot of easy images for kids. Also, many pixel images for adults are available too. For example, you can color a unicorn or an astronaut.Please, rate our coloring app ColorPix! It’s very important for us because your reviews highly motivate us to improve the coloring pages 2018!
