comments: As I have not heard of this game (it showed up in my recommendations), I would like to say that this game is beautiful! I do recommend other people to play it. The graphics are highly amazing and basic control is outstanding! I love the idea on how you can pick up items that you put down and rearrange your base the way you want it. Although, I did have several connection issues, but overall everything is in tiptop condition. Keep up the good work!

It's a pretty fun game, I enjoy it more than Last Day on Earth. Unfortunately like many people, I find the energy system lacking. I understand the need to have it as developers but it makes the game hard to play more than once or twice a day. If you could implement an increase in energy through leveling it would made progression more worthwhile and keep people playing longer. It doesn't have to be a huge increase either, maybe one energy point per lever or even everyother level.

I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club or Cart Thills can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug to me or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.  Edit: I love the events, especially the cart one.

It's a good attempt but too easy to die. No water. Seriously? I have an empty bottle yet nothing to put in it. I would like the chance to explore and build BEFORE I die five times and can't reclaim the stuff I've spent time collecting.  If these things are remedied I'll try again. Till then, deleting.

I normally dont make reviews on games that i play unless it is really good. I love the hardcore atmosphere of the game,reminds me of the good old days when i still like playing minecraft. My only complaint is that the spawn rates for the undead e.g leepers, templars are too high in my opinion. Other than that. This is a great game

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

description: A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.SummaryA brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?How to playThere is only one rule:"Connect all the points with just one line."It doesn't matter where you start.There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.When you get stuck, make use of a hint.StagesThere are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.You might think it's too easy early on.However, clearing the simple stages is also important.The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.These special lines will encourage your imagination.Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.You're sure to get hooked!!
descriptionHTML:
A brain-training puzzle in which you draw 1 line, that will sharpen your wits.
In this free-to-play puzzle game, you merely have to draw one line. It is deceptively simple, yet profoundly deep.
Play through the extensive stages, sharpening your wits as you have fun.

Summary
A brain-training puzzle game that activates your mind as you play.
When you've got a spare moment, on your daily commute, or before going to bed, why not experience what it feels like to activate you mind?

How to play
There is only one rule:
"Connect all the points with just one line."
It doesn't matter where you start.

There are some fiendishly tricky, complicated puzzles among the large number of stages.
When you get stuck, make use of a hint.

Stages
There are 10 levels, and a total of 500 stages.
At first, it starts off with simple shapes, but each time your level increases, the number of lines increases, and it gets more and more complicated.
You might think it's too easy early on.
However, clearing the simple stages is also important.
The hints to clearing the later, more complicated stages can all be found scattered through the simple stages.

Some unique types of line, such as "one way lines" and "overlapping lines", can also be found throughout the stages.
These special lines will encourage your imagination.

Use this chance to activate your mind as you play, by trying to solve this free-to-play brain-training puzzle game.
You're sure to get hooked!!

comments: (REAL REVIEW! NOT A PAID REVIEWER) Really enjoying the game. It's a good time killer. Some levels are a lot of fun and actually require a little bit of skill. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is there are way too many ads. It will randomly make you watch a video to upgrade your ride or character, and/or to play a level. There's been a few times where I had enough tickets to play, and coins to upgrade my character the two points recommended, and I had to watch a video for all three. Three ads before you can even play a level is ridiculous. I understand that it's a big part of making money for the developers, but I've never had a free game with this many ads. Get rid of some of the ads and I'll gladly update my review to 5 stars.

comments: I absolutely love this game. I spend a lot of time on it! It's fairly balanced between players who play for free and those who purchase gems to give their bots better stats. You can easily rank up without paying a dime. I did for so long, until I kept hoarding pieces and didn't want to sell. I began to use gems instead of coins.

Developers, please read.  First, this is a fun game and I enjoy its play style. It's reminiscent of TV shows like Battles Bots and game series' like Bot Arena.   Second, I would like to suggest giving players the ability to add, delete, and move weapon, utility, and wheel anchors. In the same way players can currently add enhancements to parts and chassis's and move around stickers.   Third, It would be appreciated if Quick Play Super Boxes replaced Regular Boxes after all shipment slots are full. It would provide a greater incentive to keep playing Quick Play beyond just Winning Streak Crown Rewards.  I'm offering these suggestions because I really enjoy this game and would like to see it become a more fulfilling and personalized experience.  Thank you,

This game is have potential, don't ruined it because of money. I have never been watching so many ads In my life just to get some 2 stars parts. Instead of being creative and making cool machines, this game is turning to - either pay to win or watch alot of ads to win. What's the point of "playing" in this game?

I think this app is great! But there is a slight problem with selling items. When I repeatedly sell items, sometimes if, for example, I was selling an item for 6831 coins, then it would subtract 6831 from the total amount of coins I have and then add back in 6831 so I'd end up with just the same amount of coins I was at! Could you please fix this small bug? It would make this app even better!

Good game fun to play spent cash in-game. One issue my moat recent purchase I bought 4 boxes and a bundle of gems in a deal, I got the gems and one of the boxes then my game said there was an error and reloaded leaving me without my other boxes!!! Other than this it's a fun and easy game with little to no major issues

Fun strategy game, just wish it was easier to understand upgrades and easier to get a decent vehicle. Sometimes you have to wait for boxes other times you can watch ads to get thru them with no rhyme or reason as far as I can tell. The variety or maybe the lack of variety in boxes is pretty annoying. Sometimes you get the exact same part multiple times or with slight variations, which can drag out trying to get a decent upgrade on things.

descriptionHTML:
Adopt the cute rabbits bunny and help her to grow up, taking care of her, dress her up, decorate her house and make her the cutest of rabbits !
Discover the city of bunnies with multiple activities and games to keep your pet busy. In rabbit city, you never get bored !

🐰 ADOPT BABY BU
This pet needs a new family. You have been chosen to take care of this rabbit and take care of it !

🐰 TAKE CARE OF HER
Take care of Bu and become her best friend, help her to evolve from baby to adult to become the rabbit city star!

🐰 GIVE HER A STYLE
A gigantic wardrobe awaits you to allow you to make your rabbit unique. From the princess outfit to the the rock star, your bunny will be the cutest !

🐰 A UNIQUE WORLD
Make your rabbits pet's house a magical and unique place. Customize the rooms according to your tastes !

🐰 GAMES AND ACTIVITIES
Bu is part of a cute and imaginary world, she lives in the city of bunnies, a city populated with extraordinary rabbits.
But many other animals are hidden there and they have with them magic items, it's up to you to find them to unlock unique clothes !
You will also find many other activities and games in the city of rabbits: The sticker store to start a unique collection of beautiful pictures, the photo booth to show the world that you have the most cute rabbits, a beauty salon to change the appearance of your bunny so that it is unique.

Now that this game and the universe of bunnies has no secrets for you, come and discover and take care of this cute rabbits baby bunny !
Your turn !

comments: I really like this game, kind of wish the progression system was a bit quicker though, other than that, the tight controls, open world and variety of creatures you can eat make it a solid game. The special sharks look really cool, and I even considered buying one until I saw the 50$ price tag.   On a side note, what's the difference between this app and the Hungry Shark World?

i would rate 5 stars... but.. something with the cloud save broke, i used to have the megalodon, without any cheats.. but now i have the mako. could you fix this somehow? And do i email the support team? Im not good with all the emailing stuff.

It's a really fun game, but sometimes you'll play a video to revive your shark and the video will play but you don't get another life afterwards. It's hard to believe that it is a WiFi problem because if it was an ad wouldn't be able to load at all. Also, I have paused the game before and come back minutes later and the game had kicked me out and not saved any coins/gems gained from that round. They clearly have a few bugs to work out.

The game itself is cool but the cloud sync system sucks. It doesn't even asks the user if the user wish to keep the current locally saved file to be saved to the cloud or be back to square one. I synced my wife's Google account to save my progress still on this phone even my wife's account is synced into it since I am about to hand over this phone to her & purchase a new device to myself. When I did so, the entire progress was totally wiped out & it came back from the start. Tried to synced my own account back but the game progress was totally gone! Hopefully I'll get the developers attention into this for them to get this fixed. It totally messed up the entire game progress!

IT IS SO GOOD, YOU HAVE TO BUY IT!Every level you get a new shark,though,you have to pay for them.But the good thing is you still have your old shark! You will be challenged throughout the levels! AND WHATEVER YOU DO,DO NOT SPEND YOUR JEMS!!!! You barely can get any jems,besides the five you get for downloading it.Anyway all I want to say is have fun be cool and be one with the shark! Bye,rsvp!

OMG! I love the gameplay in this arcade game I love everything about it. It is very cool that you can evolve sharks that can eat more stuff. Keep the updates coming it would be better if you added more sharks in this game . I recommend downloading this game if you want something to do in a long amount of time. This is so addictive I can't stop playing it!
description: Take control of a very Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage!Survive as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way! Explore underwater worlds filled with delicious and exotic creatures!Collect and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White, Hammerhead and Megalodon!In this action-packed aquatic adventure:• Unlock more than a dozen unique sharks and other fintastic creatures• Explore free-roaming worlds both above and below the waves• Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects• Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep• Recruit Baby Sharks to boost your predatory powers• Equip awesome accessories like Lasers, Jetpacks and Top Hats!• Find and collect sunken Bonus Objects• Sink your teeth into loads of challenging missions• Activate Gold Rush to survive longer and score higher• Take part in regular in-game events to score limited edition prizes• Challenge your friends via Facebook social features• Attack with intuitive touch or tilt controls• Play offline wherever you are – no Wi-Fi needed!• Synchronize your game easily across Android devicesCompatible with Android 4.0 and above.This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gem and Coin currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Coins can also be collected in game without requiring purchase, or by watching video advertisements from the Treasure screen.This game contains advertising. descriptionHTML:
Take control of a very Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage!

Survive as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way!
Explore underwater worlds filled with delicious and exotic creatures!
Collect and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White, Hammerhead and Megalodon!

In this action-packed aquatic adventure:

• Unlock more than a dozen unique sharks and other fintastic creatures
• Explore free-roaming worlds both above and below the waves
• Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects
• Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep
• Recruit Baby Sharks to boost your predatory powers
• Equip awesome accessories like Lasers, Jetpacks and Top Hats!
• Find and collect sunken Bonus Objects
• Sink your teeth into loads of challenging missions
• Activate Gold Rush to survive longer and score higher
• Take part in regular in-game events to score limited edition prizes
• Challenge your friends via Facebook social features
• Attack with intuitive touch or tilt controls
• Play offline wherever you are – no Wi-Fi needed!
• Synchronize your game easily across Android devices

Compatible with Android 4.0 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gem and Coin currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Coins can also be collected in game without requiring purchase, or by watching video advertisements from the Treasure screen.
This game contains advertising.
Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

"Like on Facebook: www.facebook.com/HungrySharkEvolution
Follow on Twitter @HungrySharkEvo
Subscribe on YouTube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon
Need support? Have some feedback for us? Contact: support@fgol.co.uk"

Came for Sonic, stayed for a good game. I suggest adding new ways to use coins, like for different variations of pacman or the ghosts. The only complaint i have is the loading time is quite slow

I am really surprised. The amount of new mazes I've never seen before just blows me away. Of course you can just play the classic version thats why I downloaded it but wow love this game. And you don't have to spend money unless you want to its very kick back. Adds of course but whats a dollar to you?
Absolute tons of ads. The game is good, (not good Ole Mrs PacMan, though). But the vast number of ads, clearly shows no respect to the gamer. Uninstalling

comments: Ok, so I will be calm in this review. Whenever I have the same car in a battle with red, we ram each other, but they push me off the map with ease. The main reason why I wrote a review for this game is that you should make the alien levels a little easier. The last level for it is way too hard, you can barely aim at the boss. The controls are hard too. Also can you optimize the game for the Samsung Galaxy tab A?

I would have given this game a higher review than three that I have given it, the problem is that I have noticed a problem when trying to save some money. For me at least when trying to save money through the daily giveaway/present of playing the game everyday it has stolen money from me discreetly whenever I get around the 1000 coin mark sometimes it is one hundred sometimes I have lost 400 with no explanation as to where the money is. It is for this reason that I have lowered my rating. (Besides the disappearing money I enjoyed the game.)

This game is pretty good, for the most part. The only problem is the bots you go upagainst are  way to hard. I can never win. I would have gave them 5 stars but I gave them 4 stars because of the bots. And the game is kinda hard to control. When I move backwords on a veichel it goes up.

This Game is really fun but the Spicky car is really stupid because it's so easy to die... really stupid... but other than that, the games awesome and I got the fist car thing but when I want to use it I can't find it 😑... the games the b💣mb. But the update I don't have so you should probably not get the update because people are complaining about it. AND ALSO ...CARS KEEP SPAWNING ON TOP OF MY CAR KILLING ME!!

Good for killing time. Some of the computer driven opponents seem to have a very decisive advantage at initial start of certain stages, and some of the smaller vehicles are too sensitive on the controls  but overall decent game.
This game needs major fixes, on mission mode, I get my reward after completing a level but I can't ever go anywhere after it. So I never get to move on the next level. 😒
description: Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. The only defense is ruthless offense!Collect virtual credits and use them in the Prize Machine to unlock tons of cars and loads of arenas as you play!We would love to hear your feedback. You can email us at driveahead [at] dodreams [dot] com or follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/DriveAheadGame). Here is our Privacy Policy: http://dodreams.com/pdf/dodreams_policy.pdf.Are you enjoying Drive Ahead? Help us make more fun games like this by rating and reviewing it!

description: The addictive mega-hit Temple Run is now out for Android! All your friends are playing it - can you beat their high scores?!You've stolen the cursed idol from the temple, and now you have to run for your life to escape the Evil Demon Monkeys nipping at your heels. Test your reflexes as you race down ancient temple walls and along sheer cliffs. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, collect coins and buy power ups, unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! "In every treasure hunting adventure movie there’s one scene in which the plucky hero finally gets his hands on the treasure but then has to navigate a maze of booby traps in order to get out alive. Temple Run is this scene and nothing else. And it’s amazing." - SlideToPlay.comREVIEWS★ "Most thrilling and fun running game in a while, possibly ever." - TheAppera.com★ "A fast and frenzied experience." - IGN.com★ "Very addicting… definitely a very different running game." - Appolicious.com★ Voted by TouchArcade Forums as Game of the Week★ One of TouchArcade's Best Games of the Month★ Over 50 MILLION players worldwide!

descriptionHTML:
MovieStarPlanet is the coolest social network & game for kids!

Attention boys and girls! Are you looking for stardom?
Then welcome to our planet filled with stars.
Create a Movie Star today and make awesome Movies, ArtBooks, photos, design clothes and share them with your friends and fans. You might become a famous celebrity overnight.
Let your creativity loose!
Become the best fashion designer and design your own clothes, play Dress Up and model your creations. Create the most amazing art of all time to earn Fame, get awards and rise to stardom.
There is tons of fun waiting for you on MovieStarPlanet! We are a family-oriented game that takes safety SERIOUSLY, and we always work to ensure MovieStarPlanet is a place where parents can trust their kids to hang out.

Visit our Help Center https://moviestarplanet.zendesk.com/hc/

Here's a taste of the fun and cool things you can do on MovieStarPlanet:
- Create an Avatar doll of yourself to show off your awesome designs
- Make new FRIENDS and CHAT in cool chatrooms
- Decorate your own Room
- Take care of your own pet & Boonies
- Create Looks, Fashion, ArtBooks & Movies using animations and crazy stickers
- Design your own clothes and give your Movie Star a makeover
- Watch YouTube Videos of your favorite shows and celebrities
- Play fun games with other gamers and climb to the top of our Highscores

What are you waiting for? Download the MovieStarPlanet mobile app for your phone and tablet.
Join the fun online!

See more at moviestarplanet.com – the number one site for fame, fortune, fun & friends!

comments: It's a good twist on the base building genre. Whether or not it'll keep me interested long term I don't know. We'll see if, at later stages, it can become like the others where you have to spend money or fail. For now it's very entertaining.

Sooo amazing! I've only been playing for 2 days and I'm on lvl 10 😂 I guess it'll be nice if there will be more Clan activities wherein all members can participate to avoid being bored while wiating for upgradea.  All in all,  I love this!

The game is the best addictive I have played so far ..the graphics perfect..gameplay simple flawless ,,you guys should add more modernized weapons and correct the bag where by the game freezez even when the network is Best.. Keep the gaming spirit burning
Great time killer. The packs are expensive for the bs you get. I spent over $2000 on GOW due to the decent packs, but theres no way I'd buy any mafia city packs.
Micro transactions are distroying games in every degree. Hey production and promoting team, hang yourself. This game is garbage

Excellent game, very good graphics. I only started this to get tokens for another game. Wow, I can't stay off it. I now have my own crew and we are building. My advice? TRY THE GAME!!! you'll love it. I used to play iMobs on Storm8 but they shut the game down. This is better by a long chalk.
description: ★ ★Genuine underworld strategy mobile game, play with millions of players worldwide★ ★☆Worldwide connection, no color, language or nationality differences and together compete to become the Godfather. ☆Clan, plunder, occupy and upheavals between gangs, intrigues, and compete for the honored seat of King of Mafias.☆Super hardcore and ultra hectic mafia life. Struggle for power and fulfill your ‘Alpha’ dream, you’ll not be able to “stop" playing!☆Live interactive turf war, daily battle whole year round. ★ ★Game features★ ★ ☆☆3D HD Unity game engine, ultimate gaming screen Zooming feature, 360-degrees multi-angle with well-graphic picture, providing a near real virtual reality.☆☆Live strategy RallyingCome! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work. Establish your Clan's forces and wake those potential talents. If you don’t crush them here, tomorrow they'll crush you.☆☆One and only worldwide server, along with professional translation system capable of translating all language to one✔Background and communication, matters not. Here, there are only brothers and loyalty. ✔Rule with brothers everywhere; Situate in the Coast, set aim for the vast East and into the world, unify the gang.☆☆Four major features and over dozens of gangster waiting to be recruited ☆☆✔ Brawlers, not even the word‘human weapon'can describe their ferociousness. To them, conflicts are just general lifestyle. ✔ Shooters are capable of wielding all kinds of arms, from submachine guns, rifles to artillery and many more. ✔ Bikers, with tons of heavy locomotives which move like lightning, robbing and setting things alight. Definitely a nightmare for all gangsters! ✔ Modified Vehicle can be done from a minivan to a military Hummer. There's nothing we can't change, only what you can't imagine.Mafia City Studio Official Customer Service email: mafia@yottagames.comOfficial Facebook Fans page: https://www.facebook.com/MafiaCity.EN/  Customer Service - comments: This game was my favorite of any maybe ever. I played all the time, then there was an update and I had to uninstall. It made the app close constantly (even when it wasn't even open and I was in other apps), there's way too many ads that make me want to vomit, and it stats to lag now when it never did before. Someone at corporate ruined this game. Smh.

Smooth control. Awesome idea . Not Much more I can say about it.(First Review). Now, my first thoughts about this game was that it was very good but as I have updated the game it has just been very slow and overturns when you tap. It also randomly takes you to the play store without tapping on an ad.

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

Wow!!!! I've never been more annoyed with an app in my life!!! I would play this game all day long but the amount of ads are literally driving me insane! Two runs and another 15 second ad comes up. No thanks

The game was awesome and I loved it. But the latest update ruined it with ADS. They put the banner exactly where you mostly tap with the fingers to change direction, the game got laggy which it was not before and has started getting way too many pop ups. Uninstalling. *Sigh*

comments: Great game! Awesome and enjoyable storyline, alongside with great characters! My favorite series is for sure the Campus Hacker books! Definitely recommend this app. Ads come up every so often, and you don't get very many passes, but other than that it's awesome!

I like it, but can you just change how you have to wait 2 hours just to get another pass maybe 30 minutes I know that cuts it down an hour and a half, but still 30 minutes is still pretty long. There is one more thing can you make the chapters a little longer I sit down every day to read 1 or 2 good chapters, but I finish 5 minutes later! However, this is a great app, but if you can just fix those 2 things then I would enjoy the app more and it would be great!  Thank you

In theory My shelf is a great idea 4 a library, Customable character & different stories 2 lose yourself in. Sadly it fails character creation in a way seems limited & graphics not that good, one chapter is about ten minutes long, and the cost of diamonds is ridiculous, & finally the waiting time for chapter loading is soooo long that I was fed up even before I began reading. This is a cheap 'CHOICES' knock off! My shelf u have to do better sorry.

Could use more genre variety; Sci-fi, high fantasy, horror, crime mystery, but overall good. You should take all of your "Shall We Date" otome games & rerelease them through a single collection app like this, like your competitor Voltage Ent. is doing with theirs.
Why it keep now downloading?? Waste my data, for waiting the progress... 😑 two books can't play, Untold darkness and Year book.. Please fix it that.. I like the review.

Honesty from the heart.  (The Japanese developers created some beautiful copycat creation. You kinda did. Even your title showcase two western games from Google gameplay.  Something this game strongly lack is uniqueness .)  1. The stories isn't eyecatching,  longer and interesting for me to glue on the phone screen.  2. Beauty standard is the same like every anime characters with strange mixture of 90's vibe of Beverley Hills/bougie preppy style.  Ugh. No unique character creation: hairstyle, facial structure, eye color,  beauty marks, diversity, etc.  Everybody looks like eurasian version of final fantasyby drawing aid guide.  I highly appreciate Canada/American developers for games like Choices (fave) /Episode/Story to design uniqueness in one package.  3. Where the free diamonds. I know it is a pay to play game. Aleast the another games give you free stuff as starter pack for the gamer's feet to get wet. Your cost of diamonds /coins is expensive than donut in New York. Only good thing about this game is coding and beautiful graphics. Just with otome game market or release otome game collection.  I really love your another games.  Its painful to write a negative mark on this one.

descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!

comments: Why I liked it? Because it's a simple game that doesn't make you addicted to phone but rather enjoy going forward focusing your attention entirely on your finger. What comes to music as I read in comments, I always play games without music so haven't listened to this game's. I play this game as a reward after working hard and I'm entirely satisfied. There have been no crashes so far. Lots of ads, though.

I mean the game in itself is......alright  it could be a lot better.  I think the controls are rubbish and I understand it's meant to be "skillfull" but thats harder than skillfull, you can't even see where the circle is, this also adds to the game being bad. Having said all this you have also added rubbish music..... like you could have put something decent on. I get even more of an urge to uninstall the game every time I play it. I downloaded this game for my little sister and the first thing she said was that there are way too many adverts and I agree because whenever she clicked on say the dress up or nail salon or gym and adverts would always come up. The game also lags too much even though she has a brand new IPad. However at this time I would not recommend this game. My sister said that she would play the game again if you reduce and have a limited amount of adverts. As well as the advert problems the game keeps telling me to buy everything and it pops up every time I think when you press the 'X' button it shouldn't show again. Please fix this now. As much as my sister loves this game the adverts really annoy her. Would not recommend this game!!

Really was enjoying this app, then about 10 minutes in video ads started popping in literally every 1 or 2 minutes. This totally killed the fun factor; not only was I unable to complete any tasks or just enjoy the game but the crummy ads actually kept booting me off the app. What a complete buzz kill; even tho this app was super cute & the graphics were total eye candy, the constant interruptions barging in were beyond ridiculous; both in longevity & frequency.
description: All your hard work has finally paid off - you’ve made it to the Olympics! Now’s your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! You’ve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you’ll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!Features:> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! descriptionHTML:
All your hard work has finally paid off - you’ve made it to the Olympics! Now’s your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! Work on your amazing gymnast moves until they're ready for the Olympics. Practice makes perfect! Compete your way to that shiny GOLD medal! Keep your eye on the prize!

WOW. Your dream has come true. You’ve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you’ll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!

Features:
> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! Make that gold medal yours!
> Perfect your uneven bar routine and floor exercises!
> Get ready for the biggest gymnastics competition of the year, with an Olympic "coach to the stars!"
> Dress up is always fun, but gymnastics dress up is the best! Dress up in a glittery, fantastic gymnastics leotard that will make you stand out!
> Get creative and come up with your very own aerobic gymnastics routine!
> Look like a real star gymnast! Get a makeover, a manicure, and a new hairstyle!
> Hit the gym & get in shape before the competition!
> OMG! Golden Gymnast magazine just asked you to be on their cover! Photo shoot, here you come!
> Impress the judges with stellar aerobic gymnastics moves like side aerials, triple full layouts, triple pikes, backward rolls & more!
> Ugh - gymnastics injury. No worries - the doctor will treat you in time for the big competition!
> Relax at the spa before the big day. You deserve it after all that hard work!

About Coco Play

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school! Features: 7 paintbrush colors 7 paint tin colors 39 character and prop stickers 10 animated stickers 6 magical drawing tools 3 Peppa backgrounds 3 characters to color in Eraser Choose to play with Peppa or George Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school Save your drawing to camera roll No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!
descriptionHTML:
Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love.

You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school!

Features:

7 paintbrush colors
7 paint tin colors
39 character and prop stickers
10 animated stickers
6 magical drawing tools
3 Peppa backgrounds
3 characters to color in
Eraser
Choose to play with Peppa or George
Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school
Save your drawing to camera roll
No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!

McEarn points equals mc instead of like some of the others where it takes VEarn points to reach vc etc...Also, lnstaII 'TOYOCASH' App Enterr (TRDG) very reliable in paying you when you redeem to toyocash. You can choose assorted giftcards as payment or transfer to Walet for cash. Your choice. I love these guys thanks for addingsome fun to my day.

I love the game play and graphics. But I payed for adidas female clothing and an aquarium previously on the game, and then when I restarted, they have gone. I spend £3 on it in total and I actually spent more money on other things that didn't come back in the next game, but it's understandable because they were lifestyle points and you know it's currency not clothing or furniture. I uninstall sims sometimes a bit of always go back and before my items were there, but now they're not and that really frustrated me. I actually ended up in 2017 spending  £10 on sims freeplay and that's the only money I think I will ever spend on ot now because if you restart,  you don't get anything you wanted. Please fix this because I spent that money and I could've bought something else with it but I didn't because I like sims.

First, I don't like that the game is in realtime it makes it a lot less fun and more boring. Secondly, I don't like that you HAVE to buy things just to get vip. I know that the prices are quite low but if you're just a kid like me then that limits what you can do. Lastly, I want more jobs and maybe even school to be playable it would just seem reasonable and make the game more addicting. Overall the game is really enjoyable but could do better, still keep up the good work!

im not sure what's the cause of the problem but what i know is the sims' act a lil bit freaky. i just redownloaded this game bcs i cant log in this game before bcs i just updated it. before this, the sims is ok, but now they act really awkward. when they're walking, they legs dont even move! it's like they're flying, plus when they're doing any action like "clean the dishes", they dont move, they just stand still in front of the sink. this is freaky. please reply to my review bcs i really want to know more about this. i really like this game except what i said above. this game is really addicting:).

For the fact that we can't sell multiple items at once is a big downer. I have accumulated so many windows, computers, chairs etc with watching the daily news ads and it's a complete pain to delete 30, 50, 70 or even more! items one by one. Please consider adding this function in the app as it's in the real The Sims games.

Overall,  this is a great game. Two requests.  1) Selling multiple items at once.  I bought a load of junk and I need to sell it!  2) Make the schools "playable",  like the police station. I was talking to my sister about this and it'd be cool if the schools were playable and you could build clubs inside it. Anyway,  I loved everything in the game! So fun,  so creative.

descriptionHTML:
🐬 YOUR FAVORITE DOLPHIN GAME JUST GOT EVEN BETTER!

Now’s your chance to become a dolphin trainer! With more than 20 million downloads, My Dolphin Show is loved by dolphin fans all over the world! Teach your dolphin incredible tricks, then put on shows that will make the audience go wild. Your performances will take you through seven awesome locations including Las Vegas and Hawaii, where you’ll get the opportunity to show off your dolphin’s new skills!

🐬 TEACH TONS OF TRICKS & CREATE YOUR OWN LEVELS
There are more than 80 tricks to teach your dolphin, including crazy corkscrews, dazzling donut jumps and a piñata smash! Pick your favorites and combine them in awesome new levels that you create yourself. It’s easy! Your levels can be played by your friends and other players from around the world. They will rate your levels and help you climb to the top of the leaderboard. Of course you can just play other players’ levels too – choose from over half a million levels that already have been created!

🐬 DRESS UP YOUR DOLPHIN!
Collect coins as you swim and dive in the pool, and use them to buy new stuff. Have you ever seen a dolphin dressed as a princess, or a cheerleader? How about a fairy, or a bride? There are tons of gorgeous outfits you can choose from to make your new dolphin BFF look fabulous. You can even pick new animals and characters, such as an orca, shark, mermaid, or even a unicorn! With more than 40 options to choose from, you’ll have endless fun!

description: The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!How to Play:- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded. - At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles  to get higher score Features: + easy operation but lots of fun.+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.+ Different roles dress+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly+ A combination of multiple bubbles	+ No wifi can also playif you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!
descriptionHTML:
The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!
How to Play:
- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.
- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.
- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded.
- At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles to get higher score
Features:
+ easy operation but lots of fun.
+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.
+ Different roles dress
+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly
+ A combination of multiple bubbles
+ No wifi can also play
if you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!
summary: Classic and funny bubble shooting game. all free.
title: Bubble Shooter

comments: It is amazing.really keeps you hooked on.. However when it comes to completing the quest, resources get over quickly and as per the time we need to wait for 3hrs for getting the refill,or buy it with the diamonds.... Lower the time limit for resource production like in different expeditions..as that will unable us to play more and complete it too on time.

Such a great and fun game but you can't do anything without buying food, money and diamonds with real money. No videos or exchange options. Would have played a lot longer if these options were available instead op purchasing with real money. Such a shame.

The pop-up ads trying to get you to spend money on the game that happen every time you open the game are annoying.  Also annoying that there are so many new missions that you can never finish one before a new one starts and if you do the missions you never have time to work on your own island.  This game is nothing like the pictures suggest for this app.  I thought there would be adventure and puzzles.  It's a glorified Farmville without the interaction of other neighboring farms (or islands in this case).  Still, it's addicting and frustrating that I can never clear those little missions that line up on the side of the screen.  There isn't enough time in life to finish them.

I like the game, it helps pass time. My only complaint is you make it super hard to do anything without having tonso3ns real money. Which is ridiculous. I get that you need to make money off of this, but don't be so ridiculous about it.

Really enjoy the game. Not spent a penny on it yet and managing alright to do tasks etc in a reasonable time. Though I've not completed a quest yet but that could be me not getting back to the game regularly enough. That's my issue though.

It's not my favourite game because resources take FOREVER to get. I cannot spend real money and its expensive to purchase the package. It's so difficult to get diamonds and other resources. Please make it easier to get the needed items for the events.  PLEASE  !

descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

comments: Super duper fun game,  loved it, still loving it. I managed to actually hold the ak47 correctly with my hand on the handle, same with the pistol. Just one minor complaint though,  the controls are supposed to be hard, yes,  and they are,  in a fun way, but the rotating hand control joystick seems to be inverted somehow,  could you possibly fix the rotating controls a bit,  it really throughs me off being it seems like one of the the Y axis is inverted, but not the X axis? Correct me if I'm wrong but I think that's the problem. Maybe add settings? Love the game,  and I've been playing it for a while,  nice job.

comments: Downloaded this through another app (free golden eagles) where if you downloaded and played this game, and got castle to level 10 would be rewarded. Sent off request to support a number of times with proof and no reply, and after a week still no reward.   So if you are downloading this to get reward from another app don't bother as you won't get it

Great time killer, I love the interaction and concept of the game. It can get a bit laggy at times and at it's worst, it will crash on you. The wait times are unbearable though. No ads at all since the first time I played too!

Too late to join this game. As soon as you lose your newbie protection you become a farm for higher level players, preventing you from progressing. Every morning you find all your resources pillaged and your troops dead or incapacitated. Maybe I'm just in the wrong timezone.

The game has the same problems as the other versions. The events boost strong players which makes the gap in strength larger. The premium items are overpriced. Probably the worst I have seen, there is no protection for your silver. This means stronger players always have a reason to attack someone weaker and there is no protection in place after being successfully attacked.

The game itself is great. Zero complaints there. But the fact that it I am unable to ever log in is infuriating. I've literally been zeroed out because the app won't let me log in... multiple times. It's absolutely ridiculous. Needs to be fixed.

Was never able to connect to even set up an account to try the game. Messages to support only returned with irrelevant form letters. Tried my Wi-Fi, data, and Wi-Fi at Att store. No luck and can't get an actual human to respond just a form letter telling me to uninstall, reinstall, use different Wi-Fi or get a different phone. All to try their game. LOL If that's the support you get when you are a perspective customer, imagine the "help" if they already have you hooked on their game. STAY AWAY!  (Galaxy S-7 Active Phone)

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the ruthless world of Vikings, where freedom, power, fear and violence reign supreme! Become the leader of a large army, lead your troops to victory and prove that you are the mightiest conqueror among a million players.

Try on the role of a wise and courageous Jarl, respected and feared by all! Construct magnificent buildings, take part in victorious campaigns, train your valiant warriors and boost your coffers. The superb graphics, compelling story and dynamic battles will have you hooked from the moment you start playing!

Features:
✔ Stunning graphics
✔ Free to play
✔ Numerous troop classes
✔ Multiple language options
✔ Fierce and thrilling battles with players from all over the world
✔ Handsome rewards for completing a variety of quests and tasks
✔ Weapons and gear crafting
✔ Become the leader or member of a mighty Clan

NOTE: Vikings: War of Clans is completely free to play, but has optional in-app purchases for real currency. You can turn off this option or set a password in your device settings. You will need an internet connection to play.

Vikings: War of Clans is an exciting MMORTS with players all over the globe. We are constantly improving gameplay and introducing exciting new updates for you. Feel free to share your ideas and suggestions — together we’ll make the Viking world even more enthralling!

You are a Viking! You are the Hero!

comments: I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Why can't you buy keys from your winnings? Should also be able to buy parts you need instead of the random stuff from " Donna Banks". Graffics are great. Online racing is ok. Wish the game wouldn't freeze in the middle of a race. Takes way to much space on your phone

You guys have been ripping me off with the small scale winnings e.g. especially in Amelia's Challenges. Won golds weren't credited, and twice when I moved up the ranks. Don't be a cheat. I have spent close to a thousand in purchases. Don't take my word for it. Check for yourselves.

Ok ive taken stars away lol. Whats the deal with not being able to connect to live races and what is the deal with the synchronized profile. Serously ive had 22 synchronized profiles with in 5 minutes.  ive had to redo races and events that ive already completed because of it. I love the game but its becoming more then an inconvenience. This is monotonous. Fix the issues

#DO NOT SPEND MONEY ON THIS GAME !!! YOU WILL GET BURNT BAD AND SUPPORT ARE USELESS AND DONT GIVE A S#*T..  Zero accountability from game support for lost cars and parts from glitchy programing and buggy updates. I would give it 0 if i could.

Very nicely presented drag racing game with licensed exotics and high end cars. Tuning is rewarding and fun. Lots of cars locked behind random loot boxes though which is a shame but there's still plenty of content to play through for free.
description: CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGONSetting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!REAL-TIME RACING• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.CAR CUSTOMISATION• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:• Ferrari• McLaren• Bugatti• Lamborghini• Pagani• KoenigseggCHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.DOMINATE THE CITY• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy
descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy

6 Agar Street
London WC2N 4HN

comments: Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Great game in the graphics department however, I agree with other consumers when they say the special abilities you can obtain by playing this game ruins it. Simple is best and this uno app is anything but. Sometimes when I log in, the tokens don't even recharge overnight and I have to wait a few more hours before I play three free rounds of uno before you have to pay for more tokens. Very hit and miss app.

Okay, this is actually a decent game HOWEVER unless you buy your way through its almost impossible to win tournaments.  They shouldn't be putting people in the "club" and level 100+ with people who are like level 10 and not in this "club" it makes it almost impossible for them to win unless they're INSANELY lucky.  People with cheats can turn you from being at uno and winning, to being in last place in seconds and it honestly just kills the enjoyment of the game

I liked the game overall. But, I think that there are too many buttons that do different things. Also, why do you only have 7 coins, but you need to use 2 in order to actually PLAY THE GAME!?!? It was OKAY. But I still don't know my honest opinion on this, but I would NOT use this comment as judging this game.

description: FUN, ACTION-PACKED NINJA RPG GAMETHE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ app is a fun, creative role-playing game for 9-12-year-young ninja-in-training (and other adventurous heroes). Players are assigned important missions by Master Wu, and must rescue and team up with the rest of the brave WU-CRU – ninjas Jay, Zane, Nya, Cole and Kai – to uncover ancient secrets and hidden treasures, and battle against a lurking evil that threatens to destroy the peaceful NINJAGO Island.FEATURES -	IMMERSIVE ROLE-PLAY: Create a personal LEGO NINJAGO avatar, learn how to master the most         important ninja skills, and personalize your ninja Cru before each battle.-	FAMILIAR CHARACTERS: Rescue and fight alongside your favorite LEGO NINJAGO characters. -	EXPLORE NINJAGO ISLAND: Collect blueprints, crystals, and hidden treasures to unlock NINJAGO         vehicles.-	ENDLESS GAME PLAY COMBINATIONS: 60+ levels to unlock. -	AGE-APPROPRIATE: Engaging storylines, intuitive navigation (some reading skills required) and lots         of humor!-	SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.Why play with LEGO NINJAGO?LEGO NINJAGO is an immersive story about good and evil, centered around a group of five young ninja with each their elemental powers, and their training in the capable hands of old Master Wu. Friendships are forged, and evil enemies defeated in their battles to bring peace to NINJAGO Island – always with a balanced mix of danger, creativity, excitement and comic relief. And even enemies can sometimes become friends, just as friends can sometimes make mistakes. The role-playing opportunities are endless – almost anything goes in this fascinating, creative universe.Come play with us on LEGO.com/NINJAGOFor app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactusOur privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-appsLEGO, the LEGO logo, NINJAGO and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.LEGO System A/S Website --- THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ app Support

- AGE-APPROPRIATE: Engaging storylines, intuitive navigation (some reading skills required) and lots
of humor!
- SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.


Why play with LEGO NINJAGO?
LEGO NINJAGO is an immersive story about good and evil, centered around a group of five young ninja with each their elemental powers, and their training in the capable hands of old Master Wu. Friendships are forged, and evil enemies defeated in their battles to bring peace to NINJAGO Island – always with a balanced mix of danger, creativity, excitement and comic relief. And even enemies can sometimes become friends, just as friends can sometimes make mistakes. The role-playing opportunities are endless – almost anything goes in this fascinating, creative universe.
Come play with us on LEGO.com/NINJAGO


For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.
Read more on http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

For all this time I only played girly game like The Sims, Temple Run, etc but I decided to give this game a shot earlier today. GOD how I wish I tried it earlier! This is like the best game I've played in years, it's super playable even for someone like me (who have never played this kind of games before) and I just cant believe just how much this game has to offer! The graphic is flawless, no bugs or errors at all, the control is perfect, and it's superrr realistic. This game reminds me of Hunger Game lol. I feel emotionally exhausted while playing this game because I was always in a state of running and surviving. Very recommended!

I love this game, today i jus download the game, cause my friend ask me tooo download this game and he also said it was fun! So I download it, and he was correct, this game is fun, I just become level 4! Not so soon I will become level 5! Yay for me😁 And I already bought the 1500 Diamond suit! The best survivor royale esque game you can find on the play store. Takes up immensely less space than others like Rules of Survival. Anyone can play this, no matter the quality of their phone. It's intense solo, duo, and squad gameplay will always have you coming back to take a shot (no pun intended) at another win. An amazing feature is it's voice chat communication system. You can talk to your teammates (though unfortunately, I find most players speak Spanish. You may have more luck.) though i wish there was a text chat as well. It will hopefully come in the next update, bur I would definitely recommend getting this game. My only other suggestion is new maps, a night mode, more weapons, and attachments.

Best game ever!!! I like it so much. But the only thing that I hate is that I can't play with my friends sometimes, when I open the microphone before the game starts it kicks me out of the game to the menu. Another thing that I don't like it's that there is not a way to earn diamonds. One think I would like to change is too add more players, a  100 would be nice because the map is big. If this game improves the graphics it will be the best game available in play store.

I could have given five stars. The only problem is the number of players per drop/game. Please change it to 80 to 100 range. Pretty sure youll have a lot of players and ill be glad to recommend it in my facebook page if youll be able to increase the max players. It tends to become boring when you see only 12 players left when the safe zone did not even appear yet. You will look like a rat looking for a cheese around the map. More players means more fun. If you'll take this suggestion seriously, you will thank me later.

descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.
