comments: If you've liked the first game you're probably gonna enjoy this one. It's more dynamic and there are plenty more content. Unfortunately it's built around microtransactions so if you're feeling like expending some money things might get easier. I just don't understand how they  screwed the controls this much, it's likely you're going to try placing a plant more than three times before making it.

Great game. Lots of fun. For those who aren't aware: Some levels are super hard to beat BECAUSE THEY REQUIRE UPGRADED PLANTS. Level up gives you something to do in the game expanding its lifespan. Level up is not that easy. Don't expect to end all levels Ancient Egypt with level 2 plants; level 3 or 4 are fine!

Free to play games are always the same formula: Starts off addictive, gets more challenging, starts encouraging you to buy gem equivalent, forces you to buy gem equivalent. At least most other games are fair with it though, giving you a chance. PVZ 2 does not. Levels go quickly from fun to I'm done, and become impossible. I'd love to see developers or game testers try to complete later levels without gems, especially Big Wave Beach. It's a shame, as the first game remains a classic. Buy the first game and Garden Warfare if you like it. Leaf this game alone, it's a sprout at best. Oh and remember, if zombies try to break into your house, throw your money at them.

For almost 2 years that I haven't been able to play PvZ2, just when I'm about to go and check on my account and play again, I noticed that my progress was lost. I tried to relogin a couple of times, and still I can't relogin with my old progress. My almost 3 years of playing and grinding, all lost. And without a clue of what happened. Please resolve this problem if you value old players like me. And if you think that I didn't saved it through my google acc. You're wrong, I have proof in my google play achievements that I have been playing this game for a long time.

I was unable to launch the game for some stupid reason.....i sent several messages to the developers email seeking help,but everytime i get a same reply,asking me to visit the ea gaamjng website. It doesnt work,and seems like the message the developer replied is auto generated. Does popcap/ea rlly take time to fix it? Pls help me,i dont wanna miss out on speacial events. Thanks

I like this game so much, but after the last update the game is a bit laggy, and I noticed that only the normal level music plays every time no matter what type of level I am playing. For example: the ultimate battle theme and the minigame music are all missing. I am playing on Galaxy A5 2017.
description: "As beautifully presented as it is absorbing to play: 8.7 out of 10." – ign.com Play the award-winning hit action-strategy adventure where you meet, greet, and defeat legions of hilarious zombies from the dawn of time, to the end of days. Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain. 100 Million Downloads – This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads. Winner: Best Mobile Game at E3 – Game InformerWinner: Best Mobile Game 2013 – MashableWinner: Game of the Year 2013 – Slide to PlayDISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIESCollect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens! GROW POWERFUL PLANTS  Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME Battle across 11 crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Far Future, and beyond. With more than 300 levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games, and daily Piñata Party events, there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Dr. Zomboss is waiting to take you on at the end of every world! EXPLORE MORE WITH THE TRAVEL LOGStumped about where to go next? Consult your Travel Log to embark on exciting Quests created just for you. Complete Scheduled Quests before time runs out, or take on a series of Epic Quests and earn special rewards.Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.
descriptionHTML:
"As beautifully presented as it is absorbing to play: 8.7 out of 10." – ign.com

Play the award-winning hit action-strategy adventure where you meet, greet, and defeat legions of hilarious zombies from the dawn of time, to the end of days. Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain.

100 Million Downloads – This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads.

Winner: Best Mobile Game at E3 – Game Informer
Winner: Best Mobile Game 2013 – Mashable
Winner: Game of the Year 2013 – Slide to Play

DISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIES
Collect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens!

GROW POWERFUL PLANTS
Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!

JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME
Battle across 11 crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Far Future, and beyond. With more than 300 levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games, and daily Piñata Party events, there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Dr. Zomboss is waiting to take you on at the end of every world!

EXPLORE MORE WITH THE TRAVEL LOG
Stumped about where to go next? Consult your Travel Log to embark on exciting Quests created just for you. Complete Scheduled Quests before time runs out, or take on a series of Epic Quests and earn special rewards.

Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.

description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristics🚑  Play the most realistic surgery simulations🚑  Build your own hospital🚑  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives🚑  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department🚑  Dive into two captivating seasons 🚑  Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

description: Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!
descriptionHTML:
Barber Shop Simulator 3d lets players live out the fantasy life of a top-level barber!

Work your way through twenty five tough levels that increase in difficulty with every new customer that walks through your doors! Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it? Can you turn the mess of facial hair he calls a beard into something truly unique and amazing? Barber Shop Pro 3D will push you to your limit!

Your customers don't just want their beards shaved off, they'll want you to give them that perfect moustache - the one that makes them look and feel like a real man - and they'll want it done the only way a professional barber should, with a sharp blade and a steady hand!

You'll be scored on your accuracy and your time - shave too much off and you'll lose points. Take too long and you'll lose points. And if your customer isn't completely happy with the job, he'll make sure you don't get paid the full price! The pressure is on!

Get that blade under the nose and make sure you follow the contours of your customer's face, there's nothing worse than a nick of a razor on soft skin! You've got a guide image and you've got a selection of razors, and that's all you need save for your skill. How are you at Pencil moustaches? can you shape a Horse Shoe? How about the super tricky Handlebar? They're even trickier to resist pulling on! The Toothbrush, the Walrus, the Pyramid - there's so many moustache styles out there and you're going to have to master them all if you're going to make it to the top of your game!

As you progress through the levels, the job gets harder, the time gets shorter and the beard styles get trickier! But to make it easier, you can spend your hard-earned dough on better razors that will do the job in half the time - in the right hands.

So get ready to open your doors and welcome your customers in - right here at Barber Shop Simulator 3D where the razors are sharp and the styles are sharper!

★ Pop 7 bubbles in a row to unlock the fireball.
★ Drop 10+ bubbles at once to get a bomb.
★ Play anytime and anywhere, no WiFi connection is required!


What are you waiting for? Warm up your fingers and start popping. Experience this fun casual shooter and explore thousands of amazing levels filled with puzzles and surprises. Get the best online color-matching app and enjoy a smooth and addicting gameplay. With so many exciting levels, powerful boosters and awesome features, you simply won’t put it down!

Get ready, take aim and shoot the balls!!

Download and play this fun arcade game for free. It’s the perfect app to play without wifi! Every 2-3 weeks, we add new features and new levels. Come and join the fun!

Bubble Shooter is a completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.

Follow us for updates and fun surprises!

comments: I love Beat the Boss 4! But there are some things that I would like to be fixed. For example, when naming your custom boss, the name duplicates. The way to fix it is by putting spaces after it. Another example is that the boss customization screen sometimes switches back to boss selection screen and can't go back after being there for long periods of time. I would love to give this game 5 stars if these issues were fixed.

I loved it. I understand the ads are so that you can continue your work. However, there is a few probelms. First of all, when you click on the judgey/uneven eyes, they change to even eyes. Second of all, when you click on a custom character, the game doubles the name, and following along with that, sometimes it undoes it. I understand if it takes a long time, but i'm asking you, if you can, to please fix these when you can. Sorry for bothering you.      Doge is waiting

Too many ads. It's annoying especially when you are connected to the internet. The King Boss is not working and is always saying "Something went wrong, please try again later" and crashes the whole gane. On the other hand it's a super addictive and fun game to play.

This game needs a lot of work done. So many glitches its really weird and hard to explain the glitches that happen. One of them was the screen uncalibrated itself an it was moved to the upper left side , an the right side was just black . idek if that makes sense but it shouldn't happen.

The game is amazing, but it is pathetic at the fact that there are ads popping up every 2 minutes and there's no way to remove them... I would be happy to pay to remove the ads, I won't be playing this game until this is fixed. I remember playing this game years ago, I understand you guys may be making more money from displaying ads than people paying to remove them.

I'd happily purchase this game but that doesn't seem like an option. Tge ads, especially the LOUD BLOW UP EXPLOSIONS game that go on for 30 seconds are especially annoying. I'll gladly buy it, if only to not deal with Fing ads all the Fing time!!

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyone💖 you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy 💎 gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I was confident to delete the app from my phone cos it says that the game will be saved on my fb acc. But only the highest score remained and the potion got back to 1. I was already at 56! Deym! Ayusin nyo buhay nyo! Sayang effort ko! Aba!
Too much bombs. Like i have 16 zombies and they put 7 bombs in a row! How am i supposed to win if i cant jump that high with all those bombs in the way.

comments: The car will control itself... If you hold left it will turn left for a period but will start to try and straighten up... To test is on lvl 1 first corner accelerate and turn left (any set of controls tried all) it will start turning right seems to be when the prospective changes. Looks like it would be good if it went where you tell it to. Might be due to latest patch so will try again if it get fixed

I hope in the new update you can upgrade the engine and body kits as well. That would bring back the fast and the furious Season 7 track 6 nexts to be check it says three lap but you are basicly doing lap 2 twice and it says wrong way. Third lap starts when u finish three laps and doing 4th lap counts as 3rd lap. Needs to be looked at this is cheating  u guys are doing

I have a one plus 5T with 8 GB ram still the game hangs at the finish line and all my progress is lost. I have to restart the game to get it going. Please fix this I can sent you the screenshot is you want. I love your game and it would be great if these small thing is fixed swiftly !

Awesome Game... no need to spend money to get best cards you can easily earn them... Can play offline too... There is a glitch though in season 7 - save 8 second stage... even after finishing it wont give 3 stars and fails me.

Fix the detection when you touch/hit in perfect drift mode. There's been hundreds of times where ive definately not hit and yet it ends. So Infuriating, love the game but that one detail could definitely be optimized better. The drift should not end unless you actually hit and it screws up your direction. 4/5

The cars slide like they're on ice, but with no consistency at all, half of the cars are all wheel drive, which can't drift well, and there's even a nice little front wheel drive CRX, which wouldn't be able drift at all. Also the high-end cars are just the low end ones, wide bodied into smithereens, but the developers didn't bother to bring the wheels out to the fenders. If you want a decent drifting game just download CarX

comments: The game is alright, but I  have some frustrations with it. For one, sometimes when you release the ball, the aim will move suddenly and cause it to hit off of your intend target. Also, it isn't cool when you start a new level and you have no available moves (you can't pop any bubbles! ), Sometimes for a number of turns, sometimes in the middle or at the end of the level. Usually it is manageable enough. Still frustrating tho. Maybe it is an international challenge of the game..  Overall a decent game

Uninstalling. The controls are imprecise (ball would slip off the desired direction occasionally) and the order of the colours would make it impossible to win on occasion. I can forgive the first thing (muscle) but making it impossible to win is not forgivable.  Work on the algorithm.

I used to enjoy this game when I had a minute spare. I was cruising at around level 300 enjoy the simplicity of it but not anymore! Since the introduction of the "ice" balls, it's become near impossible. Reading the other comment I'm glad to see that others are frustrated with the aim moving right at the last minute. I had this at 5 stars now it's 1.

It is a good game but is built to take $$.  There are some levels that will not let you pass without spending $$ which I refuse to do.   I understand the need to make $$, but when it is blatantly built to take money, that is where I have an issue.  I wish I could upload the video of the level this takes place in, then you would understand what I mean. Decent game but sad for the obvious reason for the game.
Best goddamn game I've ever played, most amazing graphics in the entire gaming world! I'm thinking of naming my next kid Power Pop. I didn't believe in God until I discovered this life changing game.

Good for killing a bit of time.  Too many adverts and the sequence of colours appearing make levels impossible without playing lots of times. Used all the gained coins buying 20 extra balls for 1 level and still only had balls of a colour I couldn't hit... Ice balls make current level close to impossible. Just swapping where ice is without removing anything dozens of tries and not got even close to finishing.
description: Start your engines and get ready to shoot and pop all the electric bubbles until you clear the screen. Solve the fun puzzles and challenges to level up and advance along the silver map. Download for free from Google Play and join the electric factory fun with bubble shooter. Pop bubbles and explore over hundreds awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups and features.- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.- Drop 10 bubbles or more and get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.Cool FeaturesAddictive gameplay. Play and enjoy hours of endless fun. Hundreds of incredible levels packed with fun puzzles and challenges. Bubble swap is free, simply tap on your bubble to change its colorAwesome graphics and effectsPlaying our game is easy, just follow these instructions: Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot bubbles. You have to match at least 3 bubbles of the same color or more to pop the group and win points. Aim and pop bubbles to win levels. Remember: the fewer shots you use to complete a level, the higher score you’ll get and the chance to earn 3 stars on every level. So warm up your fingers and start working on those matching skills.

comments: This app is nice. One thing I like about this app is it takes only one single unit to give a random letter hint because I have seen in many apps that they take 60 or 90 coins or whatever unit to just show a letter and this app haves daily bonus 30 coins so I love this app but I think that the app members should give a little attention on the animation because it is not so clear. Besides this all all the best for the team of this app and make good apps further.

Several times I have tried to use a hint and it  wouldn't take it off and it was difficult and easy. When I type in the logo it would tell me I'm wrong then I hit solve and it was the same thing I wrote also and if people don't know some of the logos what is the point of the game.

Love testing my knowledge but I recommend a change. Upon entering the last letter you should have the option to view before the answer is submitted. My big fingers cause me to select the incorrect letter occasionally and then I get the wrong answer and my streak is reset. Please correct this.

Great game. Simple and fun. Some awesomely hard ones and some I didn't know I knew. Especially like the achievement and leaderboard. A way to save progress would be good as I've reset my phone a few times and lost progress.

Several times now I've tried to type in a logo name and the app has told me I got it wrong but I thought it was right and couldn't see why I was being told I was wrong. So I hit "solve" and the answer is exactly what I typed in.  I have also had a few times now where I've recognised the logo but there are letters missing when I try to type in the name.  I had what I suspect to be this app deferral years ago and had no problems with it at all but since this new look and expanded number of logos has appeared it feels like you've ruined a fun app. Any chance of fixing this screw up?
It's too easy to amass a huge number of hints and use them. I'd like not to be able to complete every level without doing some online searches.

comments: I really liked this game when it had only 20 seasons & I uninstalled it after finishing. I again installed it and started from the beginning and after completing 573 games & 1487 stars I am giving you just 2star rating because game lag all the time sometimes the ads got struck or maybe during rewind I lose my $1 but the game didn't rewind back instead crash and auto shutdown and I ahve to start the application again. Before adding 30th season please update your games stability it will be more useful.

Surprised at how good this game is... very clever concept and I'm only half an hour into it and I'm already hooked! Recommend it to anyone who's a fan of football, well in fact, anyone who's a fan of gaming in general... well worth checking out, chuffed I came across it. 5***** for all features from me. The developers really did a fine job. Get it now is my advice! Peace out people :)
Like most other games, there is too much effort to bait you into micro transactions. The older games were so much better. It's a shame the Devs have resorted to such money grabbing standards.

I like the tactic aspect of it, pretty good time waster. Took me a while to beat it, but didn't have to spend a dollar to do it. The story itself is very unrealistic and after 15 seasons I completely stopped following it and focused only on the games.

There should be a full match game like this that isn't scripted. I love it! Should be an energy free mode maybe? As its a bit pay to win\microtransaction heavy.  They've made some changes, if you like ads and Facebook popping up after everything you do, then this is the game for you, dropped my rating 1 star as a result.  Also took out the ability to watch adverts for in game currency, now you have to pay. Even more of a cash grab now.

The defensive players are always faster to the ball than the offense. If you mess up during a game you have to go all the way back (unless u pay money for their in game credit). Half the time it sets you up with a shot that there is now way you can score or pass successfully.

comments: Brilliant, innovative, addictive game BUT please reduce the number of ads. That's why this game is only averaging  3.5* and why I can only give it 4*. People will stop playing very quickly as it currently is. Just take it down to an ad break every end of run. Also a way to easily view all positions on the leader board would be nice. Otherwise the game itself is great.

I would have bought the ad free Version eventually, but it was so annoying even to get used to the game, that I gave up. If you want more people to buy the game you have to give them the opportunity to play without being interrupted every death. Your game can be the best ever but still no one will play it if they have to invest the same time in watching ads that they invest in playing the game.
It's a great game, for users complaining about ads, it's called ad blocker. When devs force a billion ads and make it unplayable, I use adaway, game is great after, but without adaway, don't bother!
Game is good. Ads are bloody appalling. I have to waste 30 seconds each time I die? No thank you
Alright if you like ads more than gameplay. Stuck with 30 second ads after 20 secs of play. Don't mind some ads, but this is overkill. Pass.

Edit: Ruined it because if the ads. I understand why you have them, but I was willing to watch them IF I felt like doing another round or not. Having the choice to watch one or not was nice. Now you're just forced to after death. Sorry, that's never a good idea. And no, save your copy pasted response, I don't want it. It's not genuine, and it's just a plead for us to buy the ad removal thing.  Original: The core gameplay loop is cool. It's fun, I'll keep booting it up. But it would benefit greatly by a better tutorial. As someone else said before, the ball tends to fly off and lose momentum in ways I can't seem to figure out. Might be a failing on my part, but at times it feels like gravity changes the rules at random and I'm left floating hopelessly as the void swallows me up. I'm not really sure what the optimal way to survive is
description: Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. descriptionHTML:
Flow along an infinite horizon and challenge your Facebook friends in FLO. Roll your ball up and down hills to gain speed in this exciting, fast-paced infinite runner.

Use simple one-touch tap gameplay to travel as far as you can, achieve your personal best and connect with Facebook to see friends’ playing FLO, then challenge them to beat your high score!

Dodge deadly mine obstacles with one tap to flow through the horizon. Hitting a mine will reduce the speed of the ball, making it harder to beat your friends’ scores on the leaderboard.

★ Travel above the horizon to pick up speed as you roll down
★ Travel below the horizon to pick up speed as you roll up
★ Dodge the mines and flow through the horizon by tapping on impact
★ Tap and hold to glide past obstacles
★ Smash through score walls set by your Facebook friends
★ Losing momentum brings the Wall of Death ever closer. If it engulfs you, it’s game over

FLO is a beautiful game experience with music tracks by UK Hardcore act Fracus & Darwin.


Thank you for downloading this game from everyone at Rogue Games.

comments: From 4* to ZERO. 1st of all there is no balance in PVP at all, fresh rank 7000+ can forget about high group rank. On lvl 70 20k team power Im forced to fight vs maxed teams lvl 120+/35k+ biggest bu!!$hit. Tower diamonds nerfed so its impossible to reach floor 30+ without spending 190gems. Major daily after last update nearly useless as well. On lvl70 (2 months) got only 1 5* bird so forget about high star team. Uninstalled.

ABE continues to entertain after many months of play.  Lots to do. Very little down time after intense play (appropriate cooldowns). It's fun from beginning to advanced.  The only frustrating event is the daily Eagle Mountain event which may have more to do with my expectations than game design.

Good game but Everytime I Try to watch a video to open a chest for free or hatch an egg it just stops working . The game keeps going but the sound cuts off and you can't click on anything you have to restart the whole app. Quite annoying actually

Players are bailing from this game like crazy. My clan has lost nearly all the higher level players, most from leaving the game. So the clan is all low level players who can't contribute as much. Arena player's list shows everyone but the top 3 not playing all week. A ton of other issues that you can find in any ABE forum and even in the comments on posts on the ABE Facebook page. I think Rovio's stock trend shows it all.

I don't have any complaint whatsoever about the graphic of the game, it's simply wonderful. I wish I can change the view of the battle, so if I want to use some tricky shots, my finger won't block the view. Some birds are (almost) impossible to get, I spend many premium tickets only to get two stars bird. Must use the internet to play. Heavy use of power, battery powers are drained...fast. Simply not enough gems aquired through normal playing, and the game simply an overwhelming use of it. Insane mode is really impossible to beat without dying once or twice.

OK. So, it started off fun. But, now all I get is lost connection, slow connection or some other BS! I'm not going to be able to get any further because I won't pay for stuff. So, it's going to be uninstalled. Of you must, play for a week, then ditch it
description: Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.Embark on an epic adventure.Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.Crush the pigs in explosive battles.What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.Join weekly events.Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost! comments: Absolutely amazing game, and the ads don't lie either! Gameplay is just what you asked for, and grinding isn't horrible, just have a few issues. First why do we have to download the game every update. If your going to do that, at least allow people to play 1day without requiring the update because not everyone wants to have 370mb of updates on mobile data. Second the game is a little heavy on p2w and gold is a little hard to earn, but it's earnable. Also a tip to new players upgrade armor before anything else

The game sucks! No matter how much you upgrade their is always someone else that can kill you with one shot! Get this fixed and I might start playing again. Nice to see all the updates y'all do is to put better odds in favor of people who spend a lot of money!

been playing for quite some time now with multiple accounts. especially lvl34+ it's important to be able to chat with other players to team up! it sux not be able to chat. please introduce at least messages to friends.. btw, update is brilliant, fps highest I've ever seen in a game, ever..

Just an overall fantastic game It's hard for me to play same game for more than a month but this just makes me come back to play it. I haven't uninstalled the game a single time and that's a complement The offense in the game is great, but would love to see some defensive capabilities like shield and such

Ok first of all please fix the matchups because I just had a 1v4 match which of course I get totally destroyed. Second in every match I play a guy either has a lvl 4 Thanatos or lvl4 jack Frost. While these people get easy wins the rest of us have a huge time leveling up.

This game is the best rated FPS in mobile. However there are a lot off issues with lag spikes', and I hate how people with more levels have more health. This isn't clash royale guys! And please add a jump. We would love that. Thanks
description: ✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! • Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
developerAddress: Antakalnio st. 17, LT-10312, Vilnius, Lithuania
recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!
HIGH-END GRAPHICS
- Frame Rate settings — enjoy the smoothest gameplay ever at 60 FPS on most devices and 120 FPS on Razer Phone
SPECTATOR GALORE
- New Spectator mode — use 3rd person and top-down cameras to freely switch between players during matches
- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

comments: To many ads, even if they make the game free.. Pathetic. Conflicts with game when trying to back out of them and even crashes. Inconsistent game play, twitchy controls at times. Unplayable shots where one number on power scale is to hard the next one down is to soft.  Multi player has a feel of being rigged at times.  Potential for a good game but not yet in my books.

Used to be so much better. Cameras are now not fluid, it doesn't show the hole prior to shot anymore. Truthfully, it was awesome before you made changes... It goes back to the old saying, "why fix it if it isn't broken?"

Some observations: ball does not rebound off rails as they should, especially the back and side rails near the hole, where the ball hits the rail and stops dead. Part of miniature golf mastery is using the rails but not in this game. And when the ball is against a rail a shot is allowed as if the rail was not present. After a shot the screen should automatically rotate close to what the next shot would be expected so as to minimize manual rotation. I was making a long swipe to rotate almost 180° and my finger hit the power slide and an errant shot was made. Most hills are not smoothly sloped but instead very angular. Hitting the bottom of the slope causes the ball to jump in ways unanticipated rather than roll. This is golf, not basketball. I uninstalled the game because it just wasn't as fun and realistic as I had hoped.
It's bad because it's bad and if the developer emails me again I'm going to sue him. So don't test me

Super fun game, but WAY TOO MANY crashes. I've been struggling with a level several times only for the game to crash mid-level and I lose all my progress getting booted back to the beginning. Infuriating!
This game is good. You should try to make it a lot more like golf with friends (the Steam game). Try to make the graphics look more detailed and better. Add more maps too.

comments: I wish I could post pictures, but the game is too easy. I beat the first 2 levels both on one attempt. Though I am an experienced geometry dash player. Great fun but needs more levels. I laughed when I saw a review made by an idiot because he said this was a copy of the Impossible Game LOL it's the other way around, dumbass.

Hardly worth downloading. I love the full version of the game and figured this world be similar, or at least have some interesting levels, but much to my dismay it does not. The levels are easy and somewhat boring, which is unfortunate because Geometry Dash is usually neither of those things.

I think this game is going to change your life once you start is going to test you all you know you need to be focused to pass the whole entire thing and make sure you try to get all the coins good luck out there and may the best guy win or woman

comments: Love the app. Great time killer. Certain times of the day when playing I notice a change of cards I get dealt usually the after noon I start losing every hand forcing me to get off. I have a straight the next person always has a higher hand. Seems suspicious. I know u can't win all the time but still. Also private tables where only friends/poker buddy's can join would be a definite plus to add to the game. As some of the randoms just f around and bet all in from the start.

For a poker fan that doesn't know this game it's worth the gamble lol. The game play is good, poor player avatar customisation options as it's simply a small selection of picture options with no options for using one's social media profile pic. To that end frequently there are multiple players with the same profile pic. It struggles a bit as a social game of cards because conversation is limited by time. It has nothing to stand it out & above other poker game apps for either negative or positive reasons. If you just want to play a good game of poker with random people from around the planet though it won't disappoint. It does give the option to buy top up chips and a daily option to get chips for free from both in game buddies and a poker machine. From the entertainment point of view it ticks all the right boxes.

I recommend not to install. You can get banned anytime even without a warning or any explanation, and when u contact support you will get auto response. Bad customer support. I got banned a second after reporting two cheaters or bots idk and they took my 12 billions.

It's totally pay to play. It puts you on a fast table with higher stakes to start. You burn through your initial free chips in five minutes, then you have to either wait half a day or buy more. Well I'm not waiting 4 hours just to play cards, and I'm sure as hell not spending money when it goes so fast. Not fun at all.

Hands dont seem to be computer greedy to take your chips. Nor give higher level players generated wins with getting obvious flop or river cards giving them a win on a ridiculous hand they go all in on.

Cards are not random at all. No one gets that many flushes in one game. Please apply a new patch to fix your issues!!! Also three people in one hand should not have K-10 with K-10 on the table!! Improbable, if it ever happened in real life id think the sky was falling. Other wise an ok game but the games are in a pattern and easily predictable. Please fix!!!

comments: Excellent Game overall. Good graphics and controls (once you get used to how a ship moves) feels very real. Gameplay is fair but challenging and is addictive when trying to LVL up. Costs are reasonable but bonus cold be higher for premium account when compared to console prices. Customer service very good. I had a loading issue and advice was prompt and issue is resolved. Would edge about 4.7 out of 5 for me.

Okay, the torpedo issue is a bit better now, we can enjoy this game more. But DD is still OP. Anyway, your next homework is how the ship move. We talk about another player ship that play with us not ship that we drive. Their move is rather like a truck than a ship.  They have to move like our ship,  the stern drift first, right.

Great game! Love to play it. Had 1 problem so far. Was playing a battle ship. Was rammed by a destroyer... Had all my guns on him. His ship went OVER mine which meant all my guns were now facing the wrong way. He on the other hand torp'd me to death....

The game is a joke, cuz 1. the time is too short, 2. Maps are tiny, we meet enemies face to face 3. Nothing like the pc version 4. Needs all the ships got on pc version 5. ship turning is picullier to physics. 6. Low exp reward. Much lower.
Good game, perfect for long term play both at home and work. Only complaint is torpedoes are over powered and hit box too large. That's why I give it 3 stars

Very good engaging gameplay. I think destroyers are a bit op. Maybe battleships and cruisers should have aim assistant like destroyers have... Because sometimes it really painful to lose against one pesky destroyer :) or maybe limit them like 2-3 per battle or something. When you see 4 or 5 of them and you are in a battleship then it's no fun :) other than that it's a great game.

comments: Most puzzles are self explanatory. The odd few appeared to be impossible without some instruction. Few levels I had to skip probably around 7 levels. Couple due to pieces not moving or stuck. Very happy to be able to skip levels.  Would have been great to have a certain bank of hints for some of the  difficult ones. I found the later levels easier than the ones around 100. Max levels 120. Great fun!

Not responsive to most touches. I finally got a cheat only to realize it was the game.  Ads were not frequent but had a strobe light going off (health issues) and would not turn off. Had to close out of the game every time so I just quit playing. Typo many similar more challenging games out there to try and work with this one.

Some things are hidden in such a place makes it hard on note 8 due to curved screen. Level 89 doesn't work, as well as other levels where touching the same place over and over and over might get something to work.  Most puzzles are extremely easy,  it's just a matter of the game not working.

Good concept but a lot of the puzzles are stupid or they totally don't work unless you restart the game which is annoying. There's so many glitches I felt like uninstalling so many times! I'm just glad it's over so i can get rid of this app. 3/10 wouldn't recommend
Fun and challenging for awhile, but I found most of the levels after 50 impossible to figure out without a cheat sheet. Got frustrating. I'm at level 60 and about ready to throw in the towel.

I play this game in 2hrs and got stuck on level 42. It's challenge your mind. It's good for you, if you like doing brain games.. It helps you think about.. Like you really have to think about it or you will get stuck. But all the above, it's a awesome awesome game.

description: Let your young child build creative, virtual play houses with fun, brightly-colored LEGO® DUPLO® bricks, and play out everyday life with characters, pets and simple routines and scenarios they know from their own life. LEARNING LIFE SKILLS THROUGH PLAYDesigned specifically for the skills your child is developing at this age, LEGO DUPLO Town can help your toddler or preschooler develop fine motor skills, understand the world around them, increase vocabulary, and express their views and ideas.FEATURES:   - GREAT FIRST LEGO DUPLO EXPERIENCE: With simple, intuitive symbols and    decorations – and an entertaining bulldozer function – it’s easy to learn the basics of    building and stacking.      - BUILD AND BREAK DOWN: Just like real life, kids can build and demolish as many    houses as they want! Your child can experiment with cause and effect, with big virtual    bricks designed for small hands.    - EXPLORING: Fun surprises and hidden secrets await your curious world explorer: What    happens when your child taps the sun? Or the clouds? Or when a DUPLO figure goes to    the toilet?   - REAL-LIFE ENVIRONMENTS: Themed places that represent real-life environments and    relatable activities like making pizzas or playing in puddles!   - ROLE-PLAY: Your child will meet, interact and play with familiar characters and pets    that help develop social skills and encourage empathy.    - AGE-APPROPRIATE: Bright animations, icons, and navigation for easy gameplay – no    reading or writing skills required, and the automatic save function is perfect for both    short or long play experiences.   - SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO advertising,    links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection.Why play with LEGO DUPLO?LEGO DUPLO aims to be your Partner in Play when it comes to your child’s growth and development from age 1 1/2. We work with child development experts, educators, and parents to ensure that all LEGO DUPLO products – both in real life and in games like this – deliver value, safety, versatility, and an outlet for creative thinking that will set the stage for a love of learning and play that will last a lifetime. Thank you for allowing us to be part of your child’s journey!Create and ConnectFor app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactus Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO, the LEGO logo and DUPLO are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.LEGO System A/S Website  --  LEGO® DUPLO® Town app Support
descriptionHTML:
Let your young child build creative, virtual play houses with fun, brightly-colored LEGO® DUPLO® bricks, and play out everyday life with characters, pets and simple routines and scenarios they know from their own life.

LEARNING LIFE SKILLS THROUGH PLAY
Designed specifically for the skills your child is developing at this age, LEGO DUPLO Town can help your toddler or preschooler develop fine motor skills, understand the world around them, increase vocabulary, and express their views and ideas.


FEATURES:
- GREAT FIRST LEGO DUPLO EXPERIENCE: With simple, intuitive symbols and
decorations – and an entertaining bulldozer function – it’s easy to learn the basics of
building and stacking.

- BUILD AND BREAK DOWN: Just like real life, kids can build and demolish as many
houses as they want! Your child can experiment with cause and effect, with big virtual
bricks designed for small hands.

- EXPLORING: Fun surprises and hidden secrets await your curious world explorer: What
happens when your child taps the sun? Or the clouds? Or when a DUPLO figure goes to
the toilet?

- REAL-LIFE ENVIRONMENTS: Themed places that represent real-life environments and
relatable activities like making pizzas or playing in puddles!

- ROLE-PLAY: Your child will meet, interact and play with familiar characters and pets
that help develop social skills and encourage empathy.

- AGE-APPROPRIATE: Bright animations, icons, and navigation for easy gameplay – no
reading or writing skills required, and the automatic save function is perfect for both
short or long play experiences.

- SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO advertising,
links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection.


Why play with LEGO DUPLO?
LEGO DUPLO aims to be your Partner in Play when it comes to your child’s growth and development from age 1 1/2. We work with child development experts, educators, and parents to ensure that all LEGO DUPLO products – both in real life and in games like this – deliver value, safety, versatility, and an outlet for creative thinking that will set the stage for a love of learning and play that will last a lifetime. Thank you for allowing us to be part of your child’s journey!

For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactus

comments: Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

Update: so I've been playing for several weeks now. You cannot win with maxed out mods, racing the same level cars. They're twice as fast and you can only knock off 3 cars at the beginning of the race and you're unable to catch with others. Even if you spend money, you will not get 1st place in a lot of the races. Very unbalanced game. Whoever programmed the ai should be fired  Fun game, but the intrusive ads are ridiculous. It pops up in the middle of a race, before and after the race, finished off by asking you to pay to remove ads.

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

I don't know what the game is even like. I couldn't even get past the loading part because it won't let me tap on the screen.  I find this very irritating because I like trying out new car games. But please promise me you won't play this game any further as its a waste of your time.

The controls is very floaty like your car is late responding when tilted and i really like that this game is very fun and time wasting but it lacks car selection very small but i know it will add soon. And i thought the pic is real but it is not even the same on the game for its originality that all thanks

So many ad's, there back to back ad's. When I am finally able to select a race, guess what...another ad pops up and takes me to the play store to download it. I go back to the game and I gotta start all over again from the first screen. Ad's ad's ad's I was only able to play on the first day I downloaded it, after that..... Ad's ad's ad's                    "AD'S!!!".... But i did like the game when I played it

comments: Amazing game. Me and my friend spend hours on it. I get to shows him my mods. He has none though we both have completed the levels. The game NEVER AND I REPEAT NEVER gets boring. Definitely better than the angry birds series must download. The only problome is the metal flap things don't work correctly. They just float in midair.Apart from that  Please make a new selection of levels. My life depends on it!!!!

I would give it a higher rating, but on those levels like 6-18. The button activated doors and platforms don't work right and they glitch out. I've been able to get through a few levels without the doors but on 6-18 you can't complete the level without this door working. Please get this fixed

Very disappointed that I've had no response to my email and that there is no sign of a fix to the bug with El Porkado, rendering the levels uncompletable. Wouldn't be so bad if you didn't have some of my actual money!

level 18 in the road to El porkado (sorry if I spelled it wrong) is impossible because the grey platforms are out of place, even if I use the engineer pig I still can't get past it. also when I level up the bar goes back down again a tiny bit and I have to get more exp. the rest of the game works fine but please fix the bugs. anyway are you even listening to the other people, because I saw a lot of them complaining about the bugs. because of this you get 3 stars from me

The game is really good but the bridge bug is annoying. I got stuck on a level and tried to reinstall the app but it did not work. It is so annoying that a really good game like this has a bug that prevents you from finishing the game. Oh and also, what is different about the HD version? It seems to be the exacted same.

Generally great, but destroyed by graphics/world modeling glitches that render levels impossible to complete! Generally involving trap doors that aren't in the right place. Frustrating. AND the new cake race won't unlock rewards- 24000 hrs to go apparently so I can't play more levels.
description: From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGRCreate the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!Features:● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!● Free updates!● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!Mechanic Pig● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!● All you have to do is pilot it!● Tweak his design to get all three stars!New Episode: The Road to El PorkadoEmbark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!Get ready to see pigs fly!Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:http://facebook.com/badpiggiesFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/badpiggiesTerms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyImportant Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
developerAddress:
Rovio Entertainment Corporation
Keilaranta 7,
FI-02150 ESPOO
FINLAND
recentChanges: Made some minor fixes, but only you can stop these pigs from crashing.
summary: Get ready to see pigs fly!
title: Bad Piggies

comments: I absolutely love this game. It's so addictive and a really good game if your bored. I'm really curious to find out what happens when you have collected all the balls, does the game just carry on or is their more challenges?? Overall, this game gets five stars from me 😚

Its a really good game. The only thing is, that I wish there was maybe some instructions that appear at the beginning, because I didnt know that you couldnt hit the black lumps etc. Maybe if you add little phrases that say what to do and not to do, then it would be almost perfect.

Great time killer I love everything about it and it is a great game to wake up to. The only down side is that you fall off the ledge and that makes it harder to dodge the black. Everything else is 5 stars so that is what I think about roller coaster.
Its really fun and addictive. Awesome game play and good for passing time. Not always so friendly to my battery and too many adds. Other than those little hick ups I absolutely love it.

I think that it is ok. I don't play it a lot because its not really fun to me I think that I am going to cleat it because I don't like it that much. I don't like it there are to many adds. They always happened at the beginning and I hate it. I don't think you should not install it its not fun.

This game is amazing! It is addicting and fun to play!! The only thing is that I was hoping for some sort of introduction to the game, to tell me how to play etc. Also, I was hoping to be able to choose what kind of ball i use, the black one is plain and kind of boring. But overall its an amazing game!!
description: How long can you ride the Roller Coaster?Just touch the screen to move the ball left and right and try to avoid the black obstacles and crush the targets! Hit the targets in the middle to get a perfect hit bonus!

comments: SO HAPPY!😀😀😀😀😀😀 This is really fun! It is really magical. I love disney ever since I saw this game. Just it lags when we collect rewards and it kicks me off. Rather than that it is perfect! Great game, I need more games like this! Why do companies  do not make more games like this ?! I had been playing since the second month it came out! So 2 years. Who cares about money I do not use my real money and I am progressing a lot! Maybe it is some phones and tablets. When I do not need the characters I put them in long missions and get a bunch of magic. SO HAPPY!

Okay, this is probably the most honest review I will ever take the time to write. The game is beautiful and entertaining...just like everything Disney does. The other thing Disney does EXTREMELY well is suck money from you (I live in Orlando - I KNOW this, Man). I'm not proud of what I'm about to say but I just spent $30 on essentially a "Russian Roulette" for Alice in Wonderland characters. It's like this...the game is entertaining and enjoyable to an extent...but if you're money concisious don't download this game. I've played a lot of app games and this one FAR surpasses the need for real money. The game is entertaining and fun if you semi/kinda love Disney stuff because of nostalgia or whatever...but if you're a die-hard Disney fanatic...this game will bankrupt you. So, fear it.

I really love this game. My only complaint is when they have special release items every 2 hours or every 4 hours. They release 24 hours a day, so if you want to rank high on the leaderboard you have to wake up multiple times a night to play! I'm sleep deprived!

OK I love this game, however have a problem, I recently broke my phone had to send it of to get fixed. Have uploaded this game to my iPad have clicked it over to the correct game to keep my level however gets right to the loading section then kicks me out. My iPad is up to date, can you please fix this bug. I haven't played for a few games, the tempary phone I have won't let me play either. Please fix..

I've given it 5 stars but really it would be 4.5 stars. The prices of things in this game are stupidly high and they don't make it easy for you to get money and gems. It will take you months just to save up to expand one square in the kingdom.

I've been playing this game off and on for a little over 1 year. I'm absolutely in love with this game. The loading does take forever, and I've been having problems since I updated the game (unless it's just my phone) but I refuse to get rid of it! It's time consuming when need be, and no matter how many days I do not play I never lose my place. Two thumbs up!

descriptionHTML:
WELCOME TO THE MOST MAGICAL PLACE ON MOBILE!

When Maleficent casts an evil spell on the Kingdom, ridding it of all of its powerful magic, can you help bring it all back? Relive the thrill of Disney Parks and create the most fantastical Park of your dreams in Disney Magic Kingdoms!

EXTRAORDINARY & TIMELESS DISNEY PARK ATTRACTIONS
• Charming attractions such as ""it's a small world,"" the Monsters, Inc. Laugh Floor and Space Mountain from Disney Parks from around the world, including Disneyland, California Adventure, Walt Disney World, Tokyo Disneyland and Disneyland Paris!
• Dazzling new attractions such as WALL-E’s House and Cyclops Sushi -- all uniquely inspired by their movies!
• Relive magical moments from the Parks with the entire family through lively Parades featuring beautiful floats and fireworks!

CHARACTERS SPANNING MORE THAN 90 YEARS OF DISNEY
• Share spectacular moments with beloved characters such as the ever-optimistic Mickey Mouse, the spirited princess Rapunzel, brave space ranger Buzz Lightyear, the sweet and sassy Tinker Bell and more fun characters!
• Play hundreds of whimsical, fun, and animated quests that bring every pixel of your Kingdom to life!
• Collect memorable Disney-themed items to free each character from Maleficent's evil spell!

PLAY A RIVETING TALE OF HEROES AND VILLAINS
• Unravel and play a magical story and an exciting adventure with every tap!

comments: This is a really good game. got a great high score and it's good when you don't know what to do. But once you have been playing it for bit you get board or at least I do.and to the creators of this game to make it less boring you could put levels or different modes in it or add more  shapes. Please reply or just update. Thank you.

Your English is so bad it is insulting.    You need to hire someone to proof read before you post requests for ratings.  A definite turn off to the game which is actually quite fun and challenging.    Requires strategic planning.

My absolute all time favorite game! I used to have the woodblock version and would play that one ALL the time. The only thing I didn't like about it was that I couldn't get anything higher than 300 most of the time for the score, no matter what I did. The only time I did was the first time I installed it and played, I easily reached 1,500 points, but anytime I played after I could never come anywhere close, so I decided to look for a different game with the same concept and found this one. Instantly loved it! It's got more block room (so easier to get more points), love the sound effects, I don't feel cheated or set up like the other one, and it's a good way to get your mind working if you're someone like me who likes to think it through and plans for future possible block pieces c: plus the colors and looks is a bonus!^-^

The app is fun but it needs a no ads option for purchase. Also if the game is muted the ads should be auto muted as well. Currently the play at full volume whether the game is muted or not. It's very frustrating.

My four year old likes it and I feel like it helps him on making decisions. I can actually see him thinking what going to be him next move. I like this game and I love playing with my son. Only thing I hate is that it does have to many ads 😒

Great game to pass time. Adverts are frustrating but necessary unless you want to pay to stop, BUT very annoying when they pop up as you just lifted a puzzle piece and because of advert it just drops randomly. Also being able to rotate pieces would be handy, granted not as challenging however.
description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.>Highlights:Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

Finally! For the the longest time I've been waited, the gaming performance has been improved! No more annoying lag and the gameplay feel a lot smoother now and I am so happy about it. But the graphics still needs to be improved because it doesn't look too good and some minor bug needs to be fixed.

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

Do not upgrade your Sharks.  The bigger the shark, the more difficult it is to play.  Big sharks have more drain on health and hunger, causing you to die more frequently. Impassable areas due to size of !! shark and less fishes to eat when health gets low.  Not to mention how slow these big sharks move!  The more you spend on bigger sharks, the less fun you'll have.

I've had to start this game all over from the very beginning 3 times. After working hard to get all the way to the top sharks, the app will suddenly refuse to connect to your Facebook account and want you to start a whole new game. Waste of time. Very frustrating. Not enjoyable at all. Find a game that's enjoyable. This one is definitely not fun.
description: *** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIESChoose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!HUGE OPEN WORLDSExplore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!FEAST FOR YOUR EYESExperience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIESTIt’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!SMASHING SHARK SWAGLevel up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier!
