comments: It's a good game but having an add after every puzzle is a bit much. Yake a bit too much time and easyy to lose interest. Maybe every 5 puzzles wo ups be better I know y'all gotta make your money but the constant ads make me want to uninstall.

Since no one reads 5 star reviews I figured I would rate as 1. Great time killer during those boring meetings or occasional bouts of constipation. Want to take a break from your mind numbing job? This is equally mind numbing....but hey, play on your bosses time. When you see a picture you can't figure out, lower your mental ability to where it makes an amoeba seem like Einstein......from there you will get every puzzle. Enjoy

Really fun game! Just a couple of itsy bitsy things that get on my nerves. The coins you win are miniscule compared with how many you need when you use the Help function (even bumping it up to 5 coins for each correct answer would be better) & the other thing...I get that you need ads to keep these games free but does there need to be an ad after EVERY SINGLE PUZZLE??

The game  is good but alot  of  adds keep poping up. but i know you guys got to make your money and that.  my kids like to play this game and they enjoy playing it but sometimes the photos don't really make sence and then they lose intrest in the game and even some times im teptered to uninstall this game sometimes when i get mad with this game.

Great game. You should definitely earn at least 5 coins by default  when you solve a puzzle instead of 2 and more when watching an ad. The game seems Americanised (I'm British)  and  I didn't recognise some of the words (webmail?). Very fun though!

So... I love the idea for this game. The pictures do not represent the words in the slightest. AT ALL! When you look at a photo, it Should be one of the first words to come to mind, or at least the 5th, but some of these pictures are just so freaking terrible. Just play it. You'll hate this game because how the hell are shirt sleeves representative of clothes? You have to play to understand. This is the worst game that I cannot stop playing. I have to look up half the answers because the picture is a monopoly board and the word is "house"... like what the heck guys?!
description: * Featured Popular and Trending Top in 2018 *Looking for the best free word games to play with friends? Both adults and kids will love this amazing new trivia word game. Get Pictoword for your family and join millions of players worldwide for free!Fans of fun brain training games for kids, teens and adults, this is for you! Pictoword is a cool, simple yet addictive word game where you "read" a series of pics that combine to create a word or phrase.Guessing these words will be so much fun. Challenging and fun word puzzles will absolutely enlighten your day for girls and boys. Play single player or multiplayer word games with friends.For example, you'll see pics of SAND and WITCH. Combine the two to solve for SANDWICH - a lunchtime favorite! When you're stumped, try saying the words out loud or ask a friend! description: As more and more girls are going to get married in town, it is time to open a bridal boutique. All the brides-to-be want you to be the shopkeeper and they have prepared everything for you. Come and run it now!Game tasks:*  Sign in and clean the shop first, creating a more comfortable environment for your     customers.*  Dress our lovely shop assistants up to greet brides.*  The brides filled with happy dreams have arrived, waiting for your designing.*  Measure first and then write down each bride’ size. *  Picking the most suitable one from various wedding dress templates.*  Rich lace and wedding dress fabrics which can make you intoxicated are waiting for you     to unlock.*  Pick the fabric first, cut to the right size, design and cut it based on your design.*  Make the prettiest wedding dress with the sewing machine.*  Don’t forget to add some small accessories for the wedding dress, for each bride is     unique.*  After the brides get dressed , take pictures for them.*  Each wedding dress needs to be wrapped carefully after finished and then handed over     to the brides, striving to offer the best service.*  A romantic and gorgeous wedding dress making will be totally different in your hands.*  Saving the finished wedding dress in your phone and sharing with your friends, you will     be the top wedding dress tailor.Now, as a shopkeeper, do you get it? Large numbers of fabrics and dress templates are waiting for you to open. Come to be a great wedding dress tailor with your friends.
descriptionHTML:
As more and more girls are going to get married in town, it is time to open a bridal boutique. All the brides-to-be want you to be the shopkeeper and they have prepared everything for you. Come and run it now!

Game tasks:
* Sign in and clean the shop first, creating a more comfortable environment for your
customers.
* Dress our lovely shop assistants up to greet brides.
* The brides filled with happy dreams have arrived, waiting for your designing.
* Measure first and then write down each bride’ size.
* Picking the most suitable one from various wedding dress templates.
* Rich lace and wedding dress fabrics which can make you intoxicated are waiting for you
to unlock.
* Pick the fabric first, cut to the right size, design and cut it based on your design.
* Make the prettiest wedding dress with the sewing machine.
* Don’t forget to add some small accessories for the wedding dress, for each bride is
unique.
* After the brides get dressed , take pictures for them.
* Each wedding dress needs to be wrapped carefully after finished and then handed over
to the brides, striving to offer the best service.
* A romantic and gorgeous wedding dress making will be totally different in your hands.
* Saving the finished wedding dress in your phone and sharing with your friends, you will
be the top wedding dress tailor.

Now, as a shopkeeper, do you get it? Large numbers of fabrics and dress templates are waiting for you to open. Come to be a great wedding dress tailor with your friends.

description: The ultimate VR Roller Coaster experience. So download this free VR game now and have your own attraction park in your pocket when ever you feel like taking a roller coaster for a spin. The all new Alien Music Ride puts you an a both relaxing and high speed ride that interacts and visualizes music. The track has fast ans slow sections and the blend into the environment makes it feel like taking a wingsuite our for a drive on a alien planet. Musically speaking your going to love this as you can first pick a genre including Pop, R&B, or Dance en then start your ride aligned with the music. Please note that where the ride mentions 3D in the top corner of the tile the ride will offer a true 3d experience, as where it mentions Video the ride will be streamed through online video which requires an online Internet connection.CompatibilityThe VR app is optimized for Android mobile phones and the use of Google Cardboard. We aim to support cheap and high-end devices. If you have issues correctly displaying the ride on your headset please first check if you enabled the Cardboard setting for your device correctly. You can usually scan a QR code to automatically enable the setting for your headset. descriptionHTML:
The ultimate VR Roller Coaster experience. NEW & UPDATED version: one of the most popular VR games just got even better with 3D fantasy ride & alien music ride!

Samsung Galaxy S8 (+) users please make sure to enable WQHD+ resolution for the best experience. Settings > Display > Screen resolution > WQHD+ > APPLY

This game features multiple Virtual Reality (VR) Roller Coaster rides. You're ultimate attraction / theme park VR app is one install click away. Download it now for free.

VR no gyroscope?
No worries we got you covered. If you have a device without any gyroscope sensor please tilt your head left or right to rotate the view. You do not control the vr rollercoaster, but can view 360 degrees during you ride.

Multiple rides
Why settle for one roller coaster if you can enjoy many? Swing by your very own roller coaster park and going to be like being the tycoon of your own theme park and picking your own roller coaster ride when ever you feel like it!
The rides come in different tastes and thrill level from all over the world. Pick a more classic cedar roller coaster edition or take the fastest high speed crazy ride and discover at what point you'll get queasy.
We offer both recorded 360 videos of real rollercoaster rides and NEW an amazing interactive 3D roller coaster ride in a fantasy world that will make your jaw drop!

The 360 video rides come from real life footage making this a roller coaster simulation that is as real as any simulator can get. So download this free VR game now and have your own attraction park in your pocket when ever you feel like taking a roller coaster for a spin. Experience the roller coaster racing down the track at top speed in full 360 VR.

Latest rides
New in the 2017 a ground breaking new 3D VR roller coaster ride that interacts with live music. The all new Alien Music Ride puts you an a both relaxing and high speed ride that interacts and visualizes music. The track has fast ans slow sections and the blend into the environment makes it feel like taking a wingsuite our for a drive on a alien planet. Musically speaking your going to love this as you can first pick a genre including Pop, R&B, or Dance en then start your ride aligned with the music. Please note that where the ride mentions 3D in the top corner of the tile the ride will offer a true 3d experience, as where it mentions Video the ride will be streamed through online video which requires an online Internet connection.

Compatibility
The VR app is optimized for Android mobile phones and the use of Google Cardboard. We aim to support cheap and high-end devices. If you have issues correctly displaying the ride on your headset please first check if you enabled the Cardboard setting for your device correctly. You can usually scan a QR code to automatically enable the setting for your headset. Our known compatibility includes: VRTX One, Stooksy, VR KiX, Durovis Dive, Merge VR, Refugio 3D, ANTVR, VR Smartview, ColorCross, VRTRIA, FIBRUM VR, VR View-Master, Nibiru. Please contact us if you have any issues.
Furthermore you can use this app to enjoy the rides without any VR headset through touch controls as well.

If you like VR apps and games, and specifically thrilling VR Roller Coaster rides then this is a must download for you. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1... Get into the VR groove and claim your free VR Roller Coaster now!

description: Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 3D is an awesome new 3D Airplane Simulator game, become the pilot and fly your commercial jet to the destination. Guide and steer your plane through all of the waypoints to ensure you head to the correct destination, go through all of the waypoints and land at your destination airport within the time limit to earn yourself more pilot stripes. When arriving at your destination zone, slow the plane down and prepare for landing, be careful not to crash! Guide your plane towards the runway and park within the marked zone to complete the level. While parking your plane, be very careful to avoid the buses, helicopters etc parked along the run way.

description: Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other. Dash to your enemy and kill them!Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!HOW TO PLAY:Control with Joystick your direction.Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.  * Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here. So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.*Attention this app requires good internet connection!* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
descriptionHTML:
Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other.
Dash to your enemy and kill them!
Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.
In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!

HOW TO PLAY:
Control with Joystick your direction.
Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).
Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.

Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:
* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.
* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.
* Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !
* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.
* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .
* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here.

So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!
Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.

*Attention this app requires good internet connection!
* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
developerAddress: Suit 14, Park Lane 55, London, W1K1NA
recentChanges: Fixed bugs
summary: Dash to your enemy and kill them! Pixel cute creatures piercing each other.
title: Pixel Sword Fish io

description: Burn tire rubber in real drift cars (supercars, Japanese rear wheel steering, 4x4) in a brand new huge driving environment ready to explore. Filled with exciting sights like the big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains: more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads to drift and drive on!Drive fast and drift hard in 11 amazing different drifting cars.!! Extreme Car Drifting Simulator available now on the google play store !!Play the latest and one of the best car drifting simulator games!Choose between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars as you walk around your own garage.Customize your vehicle with unique paint jobs, special decals and more...Drift in a whole city with realistic and intense traffic, and try and build up a combo to get the highest drift score!Experience real drift in fast and agile sports cars in one of the car drifting simulators.Earn crazy amounts of cash with each huge drift to become a professional drifter and to become rich!Drive and drift the big city bustling with real traffic cars, buildings, houses, bridges and traffic lights. Perform tricks and stunts, and have fun! The most realistic and extreme car driving game you'll ever experience, Extreme Car Drifting Simulator!

descriptionHTML:
Ball ✪ Slide Puzzle to Unblock - is a simple and addictive puzzle game.
Use and storm your brain and try to solve each puzzle.

How to solved or unblock the Rolling Ball Puzzle?
- Iron tile: You can't slide to move the tile.
- Wood tile: Slide or drag to move it. There is a path on this tile to roll or slide the ball through it.


Features:
- MAZE PUZZLE: Find the path.
- SLIDING PUZZLE: An essential is for the adult to kids of all ages.
- HINT: Free hints show a correct path to you.
- 3 Stars: Get as more stars as you can.

Let’s go for amazing Ball ✪ Slide Puzzle to Unblock journey!

comments: This game has highly disappointed me.  It was super fun and interactive at first then it gives you the option to pay to continue to play or to complete free offers to unlock the game for free.  I have found that you can complete as many offers ad you want but the game won't ever unlock and emailing the support web site doesn't do any good either. They don't ever respond and it is a complete waste of time.  Don't waste your time on this game.  Go out and find yourself something worth playing because this surely isn't it.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD CAN NOT BE COMPLETED DUE TO A BUG!!!!!!  After buying you eventually get to the accordion level just before leaving the prison roof only for one (or 2 on some phones) ball being outside the play area which makes the mini game impossible.  Many reviews all over the internet highlighting this bug but the developer has not bothered to fix it.  AVOID THIS DEVELOPER !!!!!!!!!!

I really like it and how you get to interact with other people. The only thing that bothered me were the hints being super obvious. Not very helpful. Also, some things are glitchy. Like I know I pressed certain things and it couldn't detect my finger. But overall good game!!

It would be a good game if it didn't keep freezing up on me. It's a shame too because I really love these types of games (like Escape from the Titanic). Couldn't get past the level where the inmate has the task of cleaning the glass pane and has to gain entry into the clerks' office...it just freezes up and I can't resolve it no matter what I tried.

It was super fun and interactive at first then it gives you the option to pay to continue to play or to complete free offers to unlock the game for free.I tried  to complete many offers such as surveys, installing a playing another game for certain level, but this game never unlocked no matter what! They don't ever respond and it is a complete waste of time. This game has highly disappointed me.

On a serious note, you need to give me this game for free. I downloaded and played two different games to get the game for free and 5 hours later I still don't have the full game. I've had to install 5 different games just to get this one for free and I STILL don't have the full game. I'm not impressed!!!
description: No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock!  ....Good luck!  • 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.•  Hints and Answers available as IAPEscape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.
descriptionHTML:
No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...

Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?

Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.

With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock! ....Good luck!

• 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.
• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.
• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.
• Hints and Answers available as IAP

Escape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.

description: What’s your favorite holiday? Thanksgiving? Christmas? Why, it’s BLACK FRIDAY, of course!!! Get psyched - this year, you get to experience Black Friday for as long as you want and enjoy all the new fashion trends! Get ready to shop your heart out at your favorite fashion stores, to take advantage of the hottest sales at the mall, and to get your shop on in this mall world game!!! You crazy shopaholic, you!Hey there, shopper! Your expert shopping mall skills are finally about to pay off! With this amazing shopaholic Black Friday shopping mall game, you get to shop ‘til you drop at every fashion store in the mall and find the coolest fashion trends. And don’t worry about running out of money - compete in fashion contests to win coins for you to shop with! Read, set, SHOP!Features:> It’s the big Black Friday shopaholic sale season - enjoy it at the mall!> Participate in catwalk contests with other shoppers. From movie premiere to red carpet, there are so many fun fashion contest themes! All the shoppers are eyeing that last item! Get ready to fight those shopaholics so you’re the first to grab the latest fashion trends!> So much makeup for you to try at the shopping mall! Experiment with face tattoos and a cool new eyeliner color!> Dress up, dress up and more dress up! Shoulda known by the corny name that this was a bad game.

I can see through the map in several places and the Enemy and the map itself is very Glitchy.   There is an Extremely annoying rooster crowing throughout the entire gameplay and yeah I could just mute it but why? I shouldn't have too!!   Then you can hear when an Enemy sneaks up behind you.  I had an alright time playing it but it's Definitely Not a game you'd wanna spend money on, at least not THIS Version anyway!!

One Man. One War. Now You Are The Hot Sniper Killer.
*There you play the game was the fantastic 3D FPS game .As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield and hell-bent on payback.

What are you waiting for, let's take a journey and start killing.

comments: Love that the hints don't just give you the number. They walk you to the answer step by step, so you can stop after the first step that direct your focus and use as just a nudge in the right direction so you can actually learn and improve your skills. Very aesthetically attractive graphics. Lots of options for layout and features to toggle on and off. Only cons are the number tiles are right next to each other so I sometimes hit the wrong one if I'm not totally centered on the number. Also I wish I could see my top three scores for each category to see how I've improved, instead of just the best.

I like this game but there's an inherent issue with how you check correctness of a solution. Your assumption that there could be just one solution to a puzzle is wrong. It happened with me, I found a correct solution but I guess it did not match with what your algorithm found so it considered it wrong and the check feature would wrongly mark the unmatched numbers even though they are correct. If you want I can send you a picture of my solution.

If you are willing to put your thinking cap on this game will provide hours of entertainment as well as practice at using your thought process. This is the most pleasant past-time I have found among Android games.  Plus I have never had to deal with an over abundance of advertising. The programming team that put this game together are awesome.

I love the number painting. Makes it much quicker to solve the puzzle. I don't so much like the animation at the end of game when you have to wait for it to count up to your score. Maybe it's just my phone (or my age?), but I find it hard to see the possible numbers when that number is highlighted. White number with yellow highlight over it -- not a good combo.

The best of the Sudoku games I've tried.. Only complaint is being asked to rate over and over, even after game has been rated More and more ads are not allowing me to close the ad without installing the advertised app or powering down my device.  THIS NEEDS TO BE FIXED!!!!

Overall, great sudoku, helped me emerge as a professional sudoku player in the Himalayas. I have made you proud again sensei, by the strength of the Shimada clan I found my inner peace, through the lens of the Sharingan, I see the truth, and through the legacy of the Rrasengan of the 4th Hokage, I have brought honor to the Shinobi. It's also got 5 different levels of difficulty.
description: Sudoku by Brainium is the #1 Sudoku game you know and love for your Android phone and tablet, and the best way to learn and improve your skills in this classic puzzle game.With our Sudoku app, not only will you play a beautiful user-friendly Sudoku, but you’ll also have access to the world’s most friendly and complete mobile Sudoku learning system.With every puzzle, our “Hint” button can teach you the techniques you need to make progress. The instructions are easy to understand and unique for every puzzle- with helpful animations and colorful visuals. The hints don’t just give you the answer, they help you learn the “why” behind the answer. This feature will help you learn all the techniques you need to solve Sudoku puzzles whether you’re a complete novice playing your first game, or you’ve progressed all the way to expert difficulty.Enjoy a clear, easy to read, and customizable Sudoku board with visual guides that make glancing at the possibilities a breeze. Our input system is designed to make entering solutions and notes magically simple and our friendly scoring system allows you to compete with yourself or your friends regardless of skill level.Sudoku by Brainium will be the most beautiful, learnable, and user-friendly Sudoku game you’ve ever played, and it’s completely free!Features:• The world’s most advanced Sudoku learning tool• The hints not only give you the answer but explain why the answer is what it is• Five perfectly balanced difficulty levels• Two beautiful grid styles• Choose light or dark grid fonts with adjustable size• Endless collection of masterfully crafted puzzles• Useful statistics to keep track of your progress• Unlimited Undo/Redo• Auto-Fill Notes Option• Auto-Clear Notes Option• Auto Error-Checking Option• Portrait and Landscape Views• Advanced game options and notes• Five gorgeous themes• Universal App looks great on both phones and tablets• Global and friend leader boards• Portrait and landscape play options• Right or left handed option in landscapeWe hope you enjoy Sudoku Free by Brainium, and please contact our five star support if you have any questions :-)For the latest exciting news and updates on Brainium games:LIKE us on Facebookhttp://www.facebook.com/BrainiumStudiosFollow us on Twitter@BrainiumStudiosOr visit us at:http://www.BrainiumStudios.comThanks for playing!

description: Ready, aim — pop! Embark on a colorful, bubble shooting adventure with all your favorite Smurfs in Smurfs Bubble Story! Travel with Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Clumsy and rest of the Smurfs family, on a quest across a forbidden forest, mysterious meadows and rushing rivers to pick up the other Smurfs kids who have gone lost.  Join these little blue folks on an amazing magic adventure as they discover new Smurfs, explore the Smurf world, and go toe to (smaller and very blue) toe with Gargamel.  Earn rewards, unleash special moves, and expand your Smurfs collection as you puzzle pop your way to victory!  Line up the perfect shot and trigger massive chain reactions by using each Smurf's individual amazing abilities.  --FEATURES-- MATCH BUBBLES - Pop matching bubbles to collect tons of magical items. BUILD YOUR SMURFS COLLECTION - Collect all unique Smurfs for special abilities to blitz through missions.  FEATURING YOUR FAVORITE BLUE FRIENDS - Just like in the cartoons, meet Smurfette, Hefty, Brainy, Clumsy, and more. HUNDREDS OF MISSIONS - Countless missions with addictive, yet challenging obstacles. EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL WORLD - Journey through the Smurfdom filled with stunning visual assets from the movie. PLAY BOSS BATTLES - Face off against Gargamel and his minions in bubble blasting showdown to win special booster powers! COMPLETE BONUS MISSIONS - Limited-time challenges to unlock exclusive rewards and new Smurfs! GET SOCIAL – Connect to Facebook to play your friends and gift extra lives. CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS – Beat your friends at collecting the most Smurfs.   If you have issues, questions, or comments please email us at SmurfsSupport@spe.sony.com. We want to hear directly from you!   NOTE: If you uninstall Smurfs Bubble Story (or if your device is lost, stolen or destroyed), all unused consumables (In-app purchases) will not be refunded and cannot be transferred to new devices or accounts. This app may include advertising tailored to your interests on behalf of the Sony Corporation family of companies, as well as third parties. To learn more about this, visit www.aboutads.info. To exercise certain choices regarding interest-based advertising, visit www.aboutads.info/choices. You may also download the App Choices app at www.aboutads.info/appchoices. BUILD YOUR SMURFS COLLECTION - Collect all unique Smurfs for special abilities to blitz through missions. 

FEATURING YOUR FAVORITE BLUE FRIENDS - Just like in the cartoons, meet Smurfette, Hefty, Brainy, Clumsy, and more.

HUNDREDS OF MISSIONS - Countless missions with addictive, yet challenging obstacles.

EXPLORE A BEAUTIFUL WORLD - Journey through the Smurfdom filled with stunning visual assets from the movie.

PLAY BOSS BATTLES - Face off against Gargamel and his minions in bubble blasting showdown to win special booster powers!

COMPLETE BONUS MISSIONS - Limited-time challenges to unlock exclusive rewards and new Smurfs!

GET SOCIAL – Connect to Facebook to play your friends and gift extra lives.

CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS – Beat your friends at collecting the most Smurfs.

description: Ramp car game with vertical ramp is a new addition in impossible tracks racing where the player experiences a new ramp car to perform ramp stunts of mega racing games. The previous mega ramp drive games had also ramp car driving but they had not speed and new things. Those simple games lacked high speed ramp of big ramp games and drifting cars of ultra ramp games. In this ultra super sports car driving, there are utmost crazy car stunts in impossible track race. In order to enjoy this impossible racing car driving, you have to control furious racing car. This impossible racing is test for player as there are speed racer challenges of stunt car racing games. Make sure that you can easily control this crazy car game of the real impossible tracks games.The present stunt car zone is entirely different from the road tracks of the car racing simulator games and the player has car driving drift simulator which can facilitate you in this car racing simulator game. It is a real platform for you to prove yourself as car racing stunt man by showing your racing stunt skills. Be very brave to show the stunt racing skills which are in the form of impossible track stunts as the stunt challenges. You have opportunity to improve your experience of the mega ramp on the impossible race tracks which are totally different from the impossible car racing tracks. The car driving simulator is exactly like the furious mega ramp car which is capable of performing all the stunts of the track games and the impossible games.The current racing simulator is not only a racing car or the driving car but it is purely a track car which can perform high jump which is dissimilar to the truck simulator and the racing trucks. If you are in the habit of the truck race and you feel the truck simulator free as the source of frustration due to its slowness, then this game definitely offers you an open change from the monster truck game. To drive monster truck as a truck racer is comparing to nothing as the monster truck stunts are of very low status. So, don’t waste your time anymore and be the part of the current crazy car impossible stunts of the ramp jumping games. Feel the difference through this new episode and mark your presence in the ever-increasing world of car stunt games.Features:Real car drivingRacing challengeDangerous tracksCrazy car stuntDeadly racersVertical rampTwo way rampsWanted car racing Come to take part in this stunt zone of the ramp car game with the help the ramp car of the mega ramp games and make people aware about your command of vertical ramp in this impossible track racing.

comments: Loved the game for the first few minutes as it is very simple and interesting. BUT may photos temperature started to climb and quickly shot through the roof to a point where it literally burns you! And it kills your battery! For a simple game like this these facts fore me to give only one star. Fix the code and improve the graphics and it can easily get a 4 to 5 star rating.

Silly pointless battery killing little game, I loved it! The game kinda runs out of puff after level 150 though, as there is nothing else to achieve. I've got all the prestige balls, all the regular balls, all above level 150. Can we have some higher order balls above Thunder please?

Looks BORING at first. But I can't put it down now. And to those complaining about the adds, spam the back button after they start. The only adds this doesn't work for are the ones with the fast forward button in the top left
AD INFESTED! Opens up adds (videos) every time you level up pretty much, which is every 5-15 seconds in the beginning. I cannot give this a proper review when half the game is just watching ads.

Would give this a better review, but there are so many glitches. You can only upgrade a booster once, then you have to close the app and open it again so you can keep upgrading. Loved the game before this started happening. And the tap boost should be longer than 60 seconds, how about 30 minutes like the speed boost.

The first thing that happens when you open the game is collect what you've earned while you're away. And whether or not I pick the X2 option I have to wait through a 30 second add. Every. Time. Whoever decided to force adds at every collection is costing the developer a lot of money.

Great graphics and realistic feel to the lanes. Controls are a bit wonky, however, and purists won't like being being able to steer the ball after it leaves your "hand." LOTS of attempted upsells, but its free to play features ain't too bad on their own, either. All in all, a decent little bowling game.

It's a  fun game but it's rigged. I think if you have a billion chips you shouldn't be able to play on lower lanes. I thought you were supposed to be matched up with people who are the same or close level. How is it I'm bowling against someone who is level 171 and 8 billion chips and  I'm level 43 .

Amazing.  It's just fun watching the bowling hall whizz by and get a strike.  I've played and uninstalled this game, but the only reason for the uninstall part is storage.  For all of you who are new, try getting the ball between the front pin and either of the pins next to it, it usually gets strikes, but by strikes I mean doubles against level 7 Russians.

This is a fun game however it allows people to cheat or it's rigged. It's no coincidence that the better I play the better my opponent plays. I think half the time we are playing a rigged computer. I spent $50 on this app in a week and I am deleting it now. Sorry crooked people that run this app.

comments: Cute game, but not without it's flaws. I forgot the reasons I deleted the game in the past, but remember them now. It drains your battery, the life refresh time is high (20 minutes) and starting at a certain level (30) you really can't progress WITHOUT friends (this is not a positive for everyone. I personally don't like it), or money, or a ton of patience. You need keys to progress. You can either buy, ask friends, or play for one every FOUR HOURS. This is the exact point where I uninstalled the game last time.

I would taste this game higher if the only way you could progress wasn't by having to purchase extras. Having to waste all my extras to get through a gate with 3 keys sucks and so does knowing that really the only way through is to buy your way through.

I'm uninstalling game! I was really happy with game when I started,  now there is an ad every next life and sometimes more! Same ad over and over, enough to drive you CRAZY! Also you can't answer quick text or do anything off screen without the game totally rebooting,  it's supposed to be relaxing to play on phone,  NOT IRRITATING!

Why bother having an X on the Level Rush notification if it doesn't work so you have to press Begin and wait for the animation to finish before you can carry on with claiming the Daily Challenge. Also 'play with friends' on the tournament never does anything. Otherwise fun.

I have to uninstall. I love it, but it gets to the point that you cannot win.  So disappointed!!!!! I will say, this game has the very best customer service of any game I have ever played. Every single time, they go above and beyond. It's so sad when it becomes so frustrating that you can't keep playing a game that you love. I've spent b money trying to keep it fun, but I can't do b it anymore :(

I have enjoyed this game immensely up until level 240. In this level, rated HARD, there are most often no options to make strings and you're stuck with only strings of 3 of just plain air. When you see the game itself changing the color of treats several times during one game to give you a move, you know you're not imagining that this level is designed to screw you over into making fruitless purchases to overcome it.

comments: I love these games, really, and I was on a roll, but I can't get pass level 48 because my Wiko LENNY3 touch screen isn't responsive enough to register both fingertips at the same time. EDIT: I was too quick to judge the alternative way to be wrong. Thank you Bart, for your response. I retried what you said and had no trouble finishing the game. Can't wait to see the next game. You have a beautiful mind. These things you create, are a work of art.

This game and yellow have single handedly improved my relationship with my niece. She loves playing these games over and over every time she comes to visit. Christmas day she didn't want to play with her gifts, she just wanted to sit with me and play yellow. It means so much to me. Thank you for making these games.

Brilliant follow-up to YELLOW! ACCEPT NO SUBSTITUTES! And, there ARE games trying to pretend that they're the same...only Bart Bonte does it right!  I try not to let myself do too many levels at once, just so I can extend the game. I can't wait for the next color!

By far one of the best puzzle creators for Android games! I was hoping for another "Yellow 2", and changing the color really surprised me, Looking forward to... Blue? (PS: after playing for a while, All I see is orange :P)

Bart Bonte is a genius! If I see his name, I know I will love it. I just finished this one tonight and I loved every minute. I only needed the clues for the very last level because I'm familiar with Bart's mind by now. <3 I think it's great that clues are available though and that they don't give everything away right away. It's a big bummer when that happens on other games. Love, your die-hard fan! Please make another one soon!

Thank you, thank you, thank you, Bart Bonte! I've been waiting for a very, very long time for this game to come out since I first played "Yellow". Thanks a lot! But here are a few other questions I have for you: what will be the next game? How long will I have to wait until the next game comes out? Could you at least give me a hint? Thanks!

I very much enjoy playing this game. Great gameplay, graphics, and a timeless concept keep you coming back for more, but there are a few issues I'd like to address that are major game changers regarding stability.  1. Chrashing! I've played the game for about only an hour, and it's crashed a good 6 times. I have more than enough storage, good enough connection, and yet it happens to crash after about every 2-4 hunts, which gets annoying very fast.   2. I keep getting messages saying that the server is having trouble connecting to Google Play services and to my account, although I have a strong connection.   It's a rather enjoyable game, but it still has a few bugs that can change the whole experience.
To much upgrading! You should be able to hunt a entire region with 1 rifle without all the upgrades.  I realize you guys wanna make money but the amount of required updates it's ridiculous!

comments: This game is very fun and addictive but should have offline mode so we don't have to deal with a hacker every game.  Also after new update I'm having issues getting into the game. It says "check comnection" and my connection is fine even tried uninstalling it and all. Other games work on my phone and so does my Wi-Fi. The game just worked last night for me now it doesn't! PLEASE FIX!!

Please bring back the old brewery map. I have been a long time player of this game, and loved the original brewery map. The new update of the map is so radical that it feels like an entirely different map, with all the pathways and corners. The uniqueness of the original brewery map is that it is small, and relatively open, so that combat is focussed and fun. There is more time fighting others than moving around trying to find enemy players. The new update just ruins that uniqueness, making it feel like the Bureau or Legacy map. I am okay with the new brewery map being a new addition, but please make it "Brewery 2" and bring back the original Brewery.

Could you please add an offline mode...would be nice to practice on the go. Also please please please add more guns. I have been playing this game for a year and still no new guns but glad you are keeping up with the maps. I have this HUGE problem, it says check connection when I have good connection. I tried to restart my phone and reconnect but still doesn't work. PLEASE FIX.

I love the game, it's great and there's not many fps games like these for mobile phones. My only problem is I can never play ranked. For whatever particular reason I can't even find other players. The game just stays searching forever and I really want to play ranked. I would have voted 5 stars but thats the only thing that bugs me. Please fix and will be happy to give 5 stars.

Just good. This game is great. The controls are completely customizable so you can make it work the way you want it to. Graphics are on point, better than 2nd Gen consoles, lesser than 3rd gen. If this game came out in the age of the PS2 I would have bought it. Also, buy a box because this game couldn't have been cheap to make. This game should cost like $25.

I love C-OPS. It is one of the best FPS games for Apple and Android devices. It is very popular, few servers are empty. On lowest settings with 2 gigabytes of RAM, it runs at a BUTTERY 50 frames per second. Also, controls can be customized. I just notice a few graphical glitches.
description: Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard.  Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.Follow us on social media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGameYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEntPrivacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?

Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.
In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.
In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.

Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.

Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGame
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEnt

Privacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/

And completing the rail slides in the halfpipe... I've done more than enough board slides of every type and it won't complete. Still gave 5 stars though. The game reminds me of the original Shawn white pro snowboarding games.

Love the game. Disappointed that after making the quad exp purchase I am sti seeing ads. Kinda makes you not wanna play a game when you realize a developer is only out to nickel and dime customers to death...

Really fun game with one glitch. Great graphics, great sound, really fun gameplay. However you cannot complete all the challenges. So as long as gamification completeness is not your goal and you can leave things showing as 14/15 complete then all is good.

Ok so the last time I uninstalled was because the tutorial sucked and the menu was bad and the controls were horrific. Now with the new update, the same tutorials are finally finishable, the menu looks so much better. only thing keeping me from giving a five star are the controls, too sensitive
Love it. Reminds me of my ssx tricky days, combined with the game objectives of Tony hawk's games. Played it once & immediately bought it. Well worth the money, I've already spent hours playing this

Some of the mechanics of the game are broken. There are multiple goals I have completed (such as do a double backflip with any grab) that you don't get the credit for, and there's even a stage that won't unlock despite me completing every goal in the prior level while it apparently only needs 8 of the 15 to be done. Also, one of the goals is to complete a "penta flip." I have no idea what this is, and it isn't included in the diagram of how-to's. As far as I know, this can't be done within the game. It's a decent game, but the freestyle tracks are very open and repetitive to the point of boredom. I do like how many modes there are though. If you're willing to deal with occasional ads you could do a lot worse than this game.
description: Crowned the best snowboarding game available on the market, Snowboard Party is back to fulfill all your adrenaline needs in this long-awaited sequel. Experience the new time-attack race mode and practice your best tricks in 21 unique locations. Hop on your board and improve your skills to land sick combos and rack high scores!Play with your friends using the online multiplayer mode or challenge riders from all over the world using the online leaderboards. Complete over 150 level objectives and achievements, gain experience and upgrade your attributes to perform better and achieve higher scores.Customize your favorite riders with a selection of over 80 outfits including exclusive skins such as a zombie, alien, pirate and many more. Discover how to unlock the new secret big head mode. Upgrade your board to give you an extra edge over the competition. Pick from a selection of 50 boards with unique specs that complement your rider’s abilities. HIGH DEFINITION Snowboard Party 2 includes next generation 3D graphics specially optimized for your mobile hardware to provide you with the best snowboarding experience.TIME-ATTACKReach the end of the track as quick as possible. Executing tricks will give you extra speed and checkpoints will earn you more time. Missing flags will deduct points from your final score.FREESTYLE Freestyle is all about the tricks! The rider uses natural and man-made features such as rails, jumps, boxes, logs, rocks and innumerable other objects to perform the sickest tricks!  BIG AIR Go big or go home! Big air competitions are contests where riders perform tricks on massive jumps while going down the slope at high speed. HALFPIPE Perform a wide range of tricks while going down some of the world’s biggest halfpipes. Chain multiple tricks in a row to gain more points and achieve a better score. MULTIPLAYER Challenge your friends to a snowboard battle and let’s see who can land the baddest tricks! Share and brag your results with your friends on Twitter. MASSIVE SELECTION Select between 16 snowboarders and customize each of them to your preference choosing your favorite gear. A massive collection of boards ranging from different sizes and designs are available allowing you to complement your rider’s skills and abilities. LEARN TO SNOWBOARDOver 50 unique tricks to master and hundreds of combinations. Follow the tutorial to get started and progress as you go. Execute the craziest combos and trick sequences to rack up some impressive high scores, gain experience and make a name for yourself. GAME CONTROLLERCompatible with most game controllers available. LOADED WITH FEATURES •Supports all the latest generation devices and optimized for high resolution displays.•Online multiplayer mode to play against your friends or other riders online.•New fully customizable control system. You can adjust everything! •Learn over 50 unique tricks and create hundreds of combinations. •Massive locations to ride including 21 courses located in different continents.  •Customize your outfit in style!•Upgrade your board to improve your rider’s stats.•Play often to gain experience and upgrade your favorite snowboarder’s attributes. •Share your results with your friends on Twitter. •Extended soundtrack featuring songs from Templeton Pek, Sink Alaska, We Outspoken, Phathom, Voice of Addiction, Pear and Curbside. •Ability to purchase experience points or special items using in-app purchases. •Available in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese and Chinese 🏂 Join the Snowboard Party community on Facebook!: http://bit.ly/snowfacebookSUPPORT: http://www.maplemedia.io
descriptionHTML:
Crowned the best snowboarding game available on the market, Snowboard Party is back to fulfill all your adrenaline needs in this long-awaited sequel. Experience the new time-attack race mode and practice your best tricks in 21 unique locations. Hop on your board and improve your skills to land sick combos and rack high scores!

Play with your friends using the online multiplayer mode or challenge riders from all over the world using the online leaderboards. Complete over 150 level objectives and achievements, gain experience and upgrade your attributes to perform better and achieve higher scores.

Customize your favorite riders with a selection of over 80 outfits including exclusive skins such as a zombie, alien, pirate and many more. Discover how to unlock the new secret big head mode. Upgrade your board to give you an extra edge over the competition. Pick from a selection of 50 boards with unique specs that complement your rider’s abilities.

HIGH DEFINITION
Snowboard Party 2 includes next generation 3D graphics specially optimized for your mobile hardware to provide you with the best snowboarding experience.

TIME-ATTACK
Reach the end of the track as quick as possible. Executing tricks will give you extra speed and checkpoints will earn you more time. Missing flags will deduct points from your final score.

FREESTYLE
Freestyle is all about the tricks! The rider uses natural and man-made features such as rails, jumps, boxes, logs, rocks and innumerable other objects to perform the sickest tricks!

BIG AIR
Go big or go home! Big air competitions are contests where riders perform tricks on massive jumps while going down the slope at high speed.

HALFPIPE
Perform a wide range of tricks while going down some of the world’s biggest halfpipes. Chain multiple tricks in a row to gain more points and achieve a better score.

MULTIPLAYER
Challenge your friends to a snowboard battle and let’s see who can land the baddest tricks! Share and brag your results with your friends on Twitter.

MASSIVE SELECTION
Select between 16 snowboarders and customize each of them to your preference choosing your favorite gear. A massive collection of boards ranging from different sizes and designs are available allowing you to complement your rider’s skills and abilities.

LEARN TO SNOWBOARD
Over 50 unique tricks to master and hundreds of combinations. Follow the tutorial to get started and progress as you go. Execute the craziest combos and trick sequences to rack up some impressive high scores, gain experience and make a name for yourself.

GAME CONTROLLER
Compatible with most game controllers available.

LOADED WITH FEATURES
•Supports all the latest generation devices and optimized for high resolution displays.

•Learn over 50 unique tricks and create hundreds of combinations.

•Extended soundtrack featuring songs from Templeton Pek, Sink Alaska, We Outspoken, Phathom, Voice of Addiction, Pear and Curbside.

•Available in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese and Chinese

comments: So after spending countless hours playing this and building my trophies and league up to gain max gems instead of adding more leagues you demote me almost 10 leagues and my daily reward is diddly squat now. And I most of my tokens have been reduced after I had built them up. I almost had Barber bugs up to 400 tokens. Starting to hate this game 😡

Hey guys, so my favourite character is Tazzy Devil. Now you advertise him as a character in the game, I don't know if your going to update it or not but he's not in the game as of yet. Just wondering what's going on with that? If he's not in the game why advertise him?
Please include tweety bird on the character. 😍😍😍👍👍👍  Bad update though toon task can't be collected. What just happened? The heck, its too hard to level up. The pieces are too huge.

The new update has changed a lot of mechanics and features and it really feels odd from an old player and a Looney Tunes fan standpoint.  For instance, I might understand Porky Pig being moved to WB Studios, because he has had roles before such as a talent caster, but Road Runner?  Wile E. Coyote?  Ralph Wolf?  Really?  Even placing Marvin's house in WBS seems totally odd and questionable, that, ignoring the fact that the Space region is a thing in the universe.  The task mechanic also makes less sense.  One task point even for larger tasks?  And what about the Toons' houses?  They don't even change form after each upgrade and the "bigger loot" incentive still does not apply beyond Level 3.  Also, we kinda know for a fact that the wheels are rigged, but with the current update, you can't really make it more obvious.  I still love the game, but definitely less than before.
The latest update has again reverted my progress while suddenly gifting me some toons I haven't earned. I don't understand what the Devs are trying to do with this, but what a mess

Like the league store tho I wish it will sell more items used for upgrades. The league ranking was messed up due to the updates made. Players with 5000+ trophies are in higher leagues  than that of players with 12000+. Also,tried playing same invasion stage 3 times wasn't able to win the material that I need, did you change the probability again?!

comments: Such a shame. The game is great, really enjoyed the concept however it is a prime example of how monetisation strategy can ruin a game. Gems too difficult to earn without buying them, and purposely easy to accidentally spend them. Too many ads too. I'd rather have paid for the game. Deleted it after a  day or so.

Not What It Used To Be  The second to last update I did for this app switched the aim of the ball to slightly off from where you point it. So now have to compensate (guess a bit) when you're aiming which makes play more challenging.  Likewise, levels beyond about 440 are becoming impossible to beat w/o saving like a weeks with of bonuses to use on each level. Beating one level a week is hardly fun anymore! I may be uninstalling this app soon.
Everything has been great till about 1 month ago when the graph is slowed downed. After you start off there's delays in the line of balls and very unsettling it's not continuous anymore.

Game has so much potential and is a blast. I'm giving it a bad rating because gems are insanely expensive and they have so many buttons to hit to "use 200 gems to remove 3 lines" as one example or another to lose 200 by placing the button right above the back button on a phone. Super lame move on devs to intentionally take insanely expensive gems from us by mistake. No confirmation or anything, just boom, gone. Lacks ethics to say the least rinow
Games fine. I refuse to rate a game well when it's annoying ads start pushing political agenda against gun owners. Will go elsewhere
Great game.   But one of the adverts is a virus.   The IG Academy advert wrecked my game and now my phone's being a pain in the ass

comments: Cool game and really realistic. I give it a good rating. But can you plz update game sothat more players can join 1 room and plz plz plz plz add more possibility's like feeding cows can give more cows and then you can sell some of your cows and buy new ones. Or you can build a pig stall and buy/sell pigs and upgrade a farm house or build a horse place. Or paint some buildings. I would spread the game to all my friends and people i know if you add some of those things. Plz add some of them cause I really like the game alot.

Good games. Fun.. Need more equipments for farm like oldest planters to newest planter balers drill seeds ects. Need john deere too. Need rid of slurry thing not need it. All need is manure and spreader or just hual manure to make mulchs for fields to cover up dirts and need oldest tractors to newest tractos also

Purchased a bunch of tractors and unlocks and had my account charged only to find the game to block me from using my purchases. This game is a money scam. Do not be tricked into making in app purchases. I even tried contacting giants software to give them a chance to correct but to no surprise i did not recive a response to my email, they got my money why would they care now. Save yourself from being taken by this company!!!!

I have absolutely no qualms about giving 5 stars. It's a nice game. I  hope their updates will give an alternative way to the tilt control of vehicles. It's tiring. Can you also consider faster response to queries to your customer care Department?

Fun game that really passes the time. Only complaints I currently have are:  1. I just bought a new harvestor and there's no "work" button so I can harvest my crop. Trying to give it some time because it seems like a glitch. 2. I'd really like to be able to manage animals as well. Like chickens, pigs, goats, etc.  3. It would be nice to be able to store things IN the barn. 4. It'd take the game over the top if you could interact with and customize your house on the farm.

WHERE are half of my purchases??!!?? I know for sure I bought the big red harvester and the bigger mower, tredder, and wind rower yesterday. My first save has them but today its saying their all locked and I have to purchase again... and yesterday I'm pretty sure I got charged for 250k coin package twice and only received coins for 1 purchase. Can you please fix this or I will be forced to contact Google billing to solve this. FYI I have tried the restore button but that doesn't work as well. I gave you guys several days to respond and nothing. So I'm going to have to cancel those charges
description: Start your agricultural career in Farming Simulator 14 on mobile and tablet! Take control of your farm and its fields to fulfil your harvesting dreams.As well as a refined look and feel, Farming Simulator 14 gives you double the number of farm machines to control, all authentically modelled on equipment from real agricultural manufacturers, including Case IH, Deutz-Fahr, Lamborghini, Kuhn, Amazone and Krone.Features:- New highly detailed 3D graphics and a slick user interface take your gameplay experience to the next level- Play with a friend in a free roaming open world in the brand new local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth- Plant wheat, canola or corn and sell it in a dynamic market- Mow grass, tedder and windrow it to create hay bales to feed to your cows, then sell their milk to the highest bidder- Make money by selling grass or chaff at the Biogas Plant- Hire computer-controlled assistants to help you with your work
descriptionHTML:

description: Spring is in the air! Get in the mood for Easter with this wonderful match 3 game! Play over 1000 mesmerizing levels filled with many challenges. Collect the golden eggs, fill your basket with chocolate goodies and get the Easter bunny out of the magic hat. Clear the remaining ice, make the spring flowers bloom and collect the first butterflies. Eat the cookies, uncover the tasty cakes and fire off the explosive candy canes!Easter Sweeper will keep you engaged until long after Easter!There are no lives to lose, and you don't have to annoy your friends to progress. Play as long as you want. This game will fill your holidays with lots of pleasure!Swap, drag and sweep the sweet Easter pieces, like the Easter eggs, the chocolate bunnies, the creamy cupcakes, the candy stars and green spring leaves. Make matches of 4 or 5 to create powerful bombs and power-ups. And use the magic wand to collect a single piece. You'll be rewarded with cookies, cakes and lots of chocolates!Be sure to share the fun with your facebook friends. Invite them and compete with them in the leaderboards and on the level map!If you like holiday themed match 3 puzzle games, click and match, swap and match or any type of casual match 3 puzzle game then Easter Sweeper is the perfect game for you!Check out our facebook fan page for more match-3 goodness: https://www.facebook.com/SmileyGamer
descriptionHTML:
Spring is in the air! Get in the mood for Easter with this wonderful match 3 game! Play over 1000 mesmerizing levels filled with many challenges. Collect the golden eggs, fill your basket with chocolate goodies and get the Easter bunny out of the magic hat. Clear the remaining ice, make the spring flowers bloom and collect the first butterflies. Eat the cookies, uncover the tasty cakes and fire off the explosive candy canes!

Easter Sweeper will keep you engaged until long after Easter!
There are no lives to lose, and you don't have to annoy your friends to progress. Play as long as you want. This game will fill your holidays with lots of pleasure!

Swap, drag and sweep the sweet Easter pieces, like the Easter eggs, the chocolate bunnies, the creamy cupcakes, the candy stars and green spring leaves. Make matches of 4 or 5 to create powerful bombs and power-ups. And use the magic wand to collect a single piece. You'll be rewarded with cookies, cakes and lots of chocolates!

Be sure to share the fun with your facebook friends. Invite them and compete with them in the leaderboards and on the level map!

If you like holiday themed match 3 puzzle games, click and match, swap and match or any type of casual match 3 puzzle game then Easter Sweeper is the perfect game for you!


Check out our facebook fan page for more match-3 goodness: https://www.facebook.com/SmileyGamer

descriptionHTML:
A world on your mobile™ - Over 70,000,000 people are playing! Get the top rated match 3 puzzle adventure game FREE! Enter the world of Minutia and collect cute characters - Level up your team to defeat the Slugs - and play more than 1500 levels for hours of fiendish match 3 fun!

STORY:
The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony, until the night the meteor smashed into Mount Boom! A strange force transformed the slimy Slugs who lived there into a gang of greenery-gobbling goons – and now, the Slugs captured the Best Fiends’ families!

To fight back the Slugs and free their families, the Best Fiends must go on on an adventure! Level up and discover their special powers and prepare for the mystery that awaits at Mount Boom.

To get to Mount Boom, they’ll need to become… the BEST FIENDS!

FEATURES:

• BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS Cute characters and finger-tapping music!
• THE BEST OF BOTH WORLDS Match 3 puzzle adventure game with RPG-like character development!
• COLLECT & LEVEL UP Rescue and free all the cute Best Fiends and discover their special powers!
• JOIN THE BATTLE against the Slugs of Mount Boom and adventure through the majestic world of Minutia!
• COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS connect to the beautiful 3D map via Facebook and see who reaches Mount Boom first!
• STAY TUNED More levels, cute characters, gameplay and surprises are on the way!


PLEASE NOTE! Best Fiends is completely free match 3 puzzle game. It’s free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

comments: This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

Excellent game. Quite fast response on my phone. There is as almost after every level but it's ok. You can quickly click the x to close the ad. I was hoping for long words more than 6 letters but it appears that this game has only up to six letter word puzzles. I am currently at 490 level. From around 510 level onward, you only can make minimum 4 letter words. That makes it interesting an bit challenging.

The game isn't bad if you like word puzzles. My dislike comes from the fact that I have push notifications for this app turned off, but it somehow continues to manage to send them. It also keeps poor track of your coins. Good time killer.

Child-friendly! And, as an adult? I love how am yet to see an advertisement. 😊  Unlike other word games like Word Connect, it also lets you find and play words that are not necessarily those found on the board, storing it in an "Extra" slot, which generates added points to your score, rather than telling you to choose the word that's only on the board.  ADDENDUM: After reading the comments, it appears there may be ads after all. Am yet to see any though. Perhaps because am still in a lower level.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Totally FREE for all players
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

★ CONTACT ★
support@boardgame.freshdesk.com

description: Perfect Piano is an intelligent piano simulator designed for Android phones and tablets. With in-built genuine piano timbre, this app can teach you how to play the piano and amuse you at the same time![ Intelligent Keyboard ]• 88-key piano keyboard • Single-row mode; Double-row mode; Dual players; Chords mode• Multitouch screen support • Force touch • Keyboard width adjustment • Multiple in-built sound effects: Grand piano, Bright Piano, Music Box, Pipe Organ, Rhodes, Synthesiser• MIDI and ACC audio recording • Metronome • Direct sharing of recording file or set as ringtone• OpenSL ES low latency audio support (beta)[ Learn to Play ] • Learn thousands of popular music scores • Three guidance patterns: falling note, waterfall, music sheet (stave)• Three play modes: auto play, semi-auto play, note pause • Left & right hand setup • A->B loop • Speed adjustment • Difficulty adjustment[ Multiplayer Connection & Competition ] • Play the piano with other players from all over the world • Make friends • Real-time online chat• Weekly new song challenge ranking • Create guilds[ Support USB MIDI Keyboard ] • Supports standard General MIDI protocol and allows the connection of MIDI keyboard (such as YAMAHA P105, Roland F-120, Xkey, etc.) through USB interface • Perfectly control the piano, play, record and compete via external MIDI keyboard • Note: this function is only available for Android version 3.1 or higher and supports USB Host with the connection of USB OTG lines.[ Support Timbre Plug-ins ] • Timbre plug-ins are free to download and install, such as bass, electric guitar, wooden guitar, flute, saxophone, electronic keyboard, violin, chord, xylophone and harp.[ Piano Widget ] • A small piano widget for your home screen. You can play music any time without opening the App.	If you have any questions regarding the use of app, please contact us:  • Feedback: revontuletstudio@gmail.com  • Business: business@adorca.com  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PerfectPianoLet's rock and roll!
descriptionHTML:
Perfect Piano is an intelligent piano simulator designed for Android phones and tablets. With in-built genuine piano timbre, this app can teach you how to play the piano and amuse you at the same time!

[ Intelligent Keyboard ]
• 88-key piano keyboard
• Single-row mode; Double-row mode; Dual players; Chords mode
• Multitouch screen support
• Force touch
• Keyboard width adjustment
• Multiple in-built sound effects: Grand piano, Bright Piano, Music Box, Pipe Organ, Rhodes, Synthesiser
• MIDI and ACC audio recording
• Metronome
• Direct sharing of recording file or set as ringtone
• OpenSL ES low latency audio support (beta)

[ Learn to Play ]
• Learn thousands of popular music scores
• Three guidance patterns: falling note, waterfall, music sheet (stave)
• Three play modes: auto play, semi-auto play, note pause
• Left & right hand setup
• A->B loop
• Speed adjustment
• Difficulty adjustment

[ Multiplayer Connection & Competition ]
• Play the piano with other players from all over the world
• Make friends
• Real-time online chat
• Weekly new song challenge ranking
• Create guilds

[ Support USB MIDI Keyboard ]
• Supports standard General MIDI protocol and allows the connection of MIDI keyboard (such as YAMAHA P105, Roland F-120, Xkey, etc.) through USB interface
• Perfectly control the piano, play, record and compete via external MIDI keyboard
• Note: this function is only available for Android version 3.1 or higher and supports USB Host with the connection of USB OTG lines.

[ Support Timbre Plug-ins ]
• Timbre plug-ins are free to download and install, such as bass, electric guitar, wooden guitar, flute, saxophone, electronic keyboard, violin, chord, xylophone and harp.

[ Piano Widget ]
• A small piano widget for your home screen. You can play music any time without opening the App.

If you have any questions regarding the use of app, please contact us:
• Feedback: revontuletstudio@gmail.com
• Business: business@adorca.com
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PerfectPiano

Let's rock and roll!

title: Perfect Piano
